title: #CreateYourEarthLife Christian Podcast - Bible Studies, Testimonies and Faith Based Entrepreneurship
description:
Welcome to the #CreateYourEarthLife Christian Podcast: From me, me, me to Christianity! This podcast converted with me when I was saved by Jesus. It went from new age spiritual education to the focus being solely on Jesus and how we can all grow closer to Him. Some episodes are solo hosted by me, Jenasa Prudhomme, and some episodes include guests who share their testimony of how Jesus changed their life. If you are interested in sharing your testimony on the podcast, contact me through my e-mail: jenasa@createyourearthlife.com

If you are looking to grow your faith even deeper, here is a FREE Bearing Fruits Prayer Journal for YOU: https://createyourearthlife.com/bearing-fruits-prayer-journal/

Are you wondering how to teach your children about God? I have a FREE resource for you. The "Planting Seeds: 10 Ways to Teach Your Children about God" guide will give you ideas on how to incorporate teachings about God throughout your day AND it includes a game! I have utilized every single one of these ideas in my home with my children! Check it out: https://createyourearthlife.ck.page/planting-seeds-guide

I share occasional entrepreneur tips to help YOU grow your ministry and/or business! I have spent the past two years growing an online ministry and business by starting and growing a podcast, blog, and social media pages. I have done endless hours of research, joined many free classes, and hired coaches to help me grow my online business. With the knowledge I have gathered, I wrote an eBook called Faith Based Entrepreneurship which is all about equipping you on the online space. I have recently updated it! Check it out: https://createyourearthlife.ck.page/products/faith-based-entrepreneurship

Please subscribe to the #CreateYourEarthLife podcast so you have access to free episodes that will help YOU grow closer to Jesus!

If you would like to help the podcast grow, please leave a friendly review and share episodes with your friends, family, and online followers!

Let's dig into God's word through Bible studies and testimonies!

title: Rise of the Divine Feminine Podcast
description:
Welcome to Rise of the Divine Feminine Podcast!
This listening experience is brought to you by the Goddess Queen and Goddess of Evolution, Jameelah Assata~ Sacred Feminine Community Creator. 
This podcast will help you understand the shift of and tapping into the authentic divine feminine. You will learn the principles of divine femininity, what it truly means to embody Goddess and how to utilize these attributes in your own life.
Tune in weekly for fresh new episodes teaching you how to tap into your authentic feminine, your divine feminine! 
Visit our website for courses, classes and retreats freethefeminine.com

title: Everything We Can't See
description: A paranormal podcast based on everything spooky. Every other week we will be focusing on paranormal hot spots all over the world. We will be discussing the history, the spooky stuff, and most importantly if we believe the place is truly haunted.

title: Conscious Stoic
description:
Conscious Stoic is a collective of human beings coming together, connecting with our innermost selves to find who we truly are, and what matters in life.
Through sharing our stories we broaden each other’s perspectives, helping us realize we are all a part of the human experience.

title: The BreadNButter Show
description:
The Bread N Butter Show is here to inspire you to chase your dreams no matter the obstacles you face…and you will face obstacles. I am your host, Jarren Dozier, and I’ll be having real conversations diving deep into who/what inspires me, sharing real stories of rising up and meeting the challenges we all face daily hopefully motivating you to do the same. 

Taking massive action to achieve your life goals can come with feelings of doubt and even fear, it’s our job to give you the right kick to make that first step in the right direction, the rest is up to you. We help listeners believe in themselves because that’s going to be your super power on your journey towards whatever growth you want personally or in business. 

Let’s grow together with our “Daily Bread" to stay strong in mind and body. I will be sharing inspiring messages daily on Instagram and Facebook.

Don’t forget to like, comment & subscribe! @thebreadnbuttershow

title: The Singing Medium Podcast
description:
Welcome to The Singing Medium Podcast. A space where you can fully dive into the Spirit World in many different aspects. If you're a practicing or developing Medium, if you hear voices you don't quite understand or simply want to remember that your Loved Ones in Spirit are always with you, this is the podcast for you.  As a professionally trained Medium, I am happy to be your Guide to the Spirit World.


Listen to client readings, hear their stories and witness their healing journey of grief and the power of unconditional love.

title: Vida Devocional
description: Vida Devocional es un ministerio de Iglesia Bíblica Vida Real. Nuestra misión es sembrar la verdad en los corazones de las personas y cosechar vidas nuevas para el reino de Dios. Este podcast es un recurso que nos permite avanzar esa misión, ya que comparte devocionales bíblicos que te ayudarán a crecer en tu relación personal con Dios. ¡Que los disfrutes!

title: Gaia's Toolbox
description: Helping you cultivate a toolbox of practises to expand your consciousness and come back into wholeness.

title: The Core Behavioral Therapist
description: COVID-19 & the Black Lives Matter Movement has shaken the world to it's core. It has had a prominent effect on mental health igniting anxiety, depression, coping with injustices and other psychological ailments. This podcast can educate, alleviate pain and shed light on mental health. It is celebrating who you were, who you are and who you are becoming.

title: The Pastor and The Witch Podcast
description: This is a podcast about two people with two different beliefs, backgrounds and experiences coming together. Our experiences that have shaped us that include sexual and physical abuse, death and chronic illness, and judgement. This is our story offcoming together, being fired from a "Church" for marrying a person that is not a "christian" and our experiences with everything before and up to the present day.

title: Best Damn Reality
description: This unique podcast is one piece of a much bigger, co-creative, life puzzle from the mind and heart of Alyson Noune’.  Part spiritual inspiration.  Part story-telling.  Part imagination.  All in various stages of ‘reality’.  Enjoy the show on its own or take your experience up a notch by also visiting Alyson’s YouTube channel and FaceBook business page.  Like a modern day choose-your-own-adventure, journey along however the choices call you.  All roads lead to a world much more representative of the true limitless nature of our consciousness and as such, what we can create as our greater, shared reality.  The first 12 episodes will also serve as phase 1 of the literal creation of Ripple2020. Taking what is at present, only an idea and making it ‘real’.  I invite you to listen, participate, and co-create.

title: Power Sermon Podcast
description: Unstoppable

title: The Wright Ecotheologian
description: As a scholar-practitioner in the areas of sustainability, ethics, service-learning and community engagement, I want to share my conversations with people who are walking-the-walk and talking-the-talk in these areas. It will take a village to overcome the lack of trust, hurt, and woundedness in our world -- but if not me, then who? And if not now, then when? It is a mantra I heard at a conference and it echos in my mind and heart daily. I hope that you will be able to connect with these podcasts that focus on the work I do as an ecotheologian and the Director of The Collaborative for the Common Good (CCG) at Wingate University. Enjoy -- be sure to respond and let me know what you think!

title: Yogi Horse Women
description: In this podcast, lifelong horse woman and yoga teacher, Terry Newton delves deeply into the vast topics of Yoga and Spiritual Horsemanship with the women that inspire her. It's equal parts exploration and celebration of yoga, horse connection and how they come together in the lives of women.

title: SDBC Podcast
description: South Delta Baptist Church (SDBC) is a missional Christian church in the Vancouver area in Canada. SDBC Podcast is for anyone interested in Christianity and culture. Our hosts, Pastor Paul Park and Mary Grierson, and various guests will discuss important issues in culture and how to navigate our world with Christ as our Lord and the bible as our lens through which we view the world.

title: The Age of Light
description:
This podcast is dedicated to our generation of light. We live in an age where we are becoming more conscious and in touch with our inner light, but also with our magical surroundings. 

I speak of my personal journey and learnings along the way, as well as interviewing people whose message I believe needs to be heard. 

Please get in touch or leave a review if something resonates with you.

My website: https://www.growingtobeme.co.uk/

Love, Darleen x

Find me via Instagram @iamdarleenklug
Cover photo: Alexander Stagg

title: Nope. I'm Scared
description: Hello! We are just two sisters who love to talk about the weird and spooky. True crime? yep. Ghosts? Of course. Lore? Oh, you bet. Hopefully we are serving up something you can dig (like a grave) and come on our spooky adventure with us. We are in no way pros at this and are very much still figuring this all out, but we're having fun and hope you do too. Byeeeeeee!

title: Central Baptist Church - Dunn, NC
description: Welcome to the podcast of Central Baptist Church of Dunn, North Carolina! Our desire through this podcast is to see you grow in your walk with Christ. Connect with us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and online at www.cbccdunn.com.

title: Le Chemin... J'ai rendez-vous avec moi
description:
Ces méditations se proposent à toi comme des amies chaleureuses qui souhaitent t'aider sur ton cheminement de vie.
Je les partage ici comme une synthèse d'un long processus personnel de 40 ans, au cours duquel la méditation a eu toujours sa place privilégiée. Au fil des années, elle changeait ses formes, styles et origines, mais restait toujours un moment précieux et indispensable pour revenir vers moi-même et vers l'essentiel. 
Etant engagée sur ce chemin spirituel authentique et profond, je m'inspire de différentes approches thérapeutiques, artistiques et énergétiques qui viennent compléter une vision et un amour pour l'être humain dans sa globalité.
Ainsi s'explique mon style très personnel et la variété des propositions.

Je propose ici toujours quelques méditations par cycle pour donner un aperçu et une première expérience. Si tu es intéressé d'avoir accès aux suites (il y a entre 7 et 30 séances par cycle), contacte moi par mail (juliahuppert1@gmail.com) et je te demanderai une donation d'un montant libre en échange.

Merci pour ton intérêt !

title: Hauntz 'N' Creepz
description:
Welcome to Hauntz 'N' Creepz! We are two cousins with a shared interest in all things haunted and creepy! Join Aysia, the born-again witch who accidentally opens portals in mirrors, and Rose, the atheist-skeptic nurse who scares easier than she likes to admit!

We cover hauntings, cryptids, true crime, and creepy items from all over the world! Feel free to suggest your bone chilling story to us!

Northminster Presbyterian Church is an ECO congregation in Peoria, Illinois.

title: Good Girl Gone Goddess- De-construction, Spirituality, Feminine Embodiment,Sex Positivity, Wahine
description:
Welcome to the Good Girl Gone GODDESS podcast!

This podcast is a soft place to land when you begin to question it ALL. It focuses on the exploration of personal truths, not dogma or a critique of religion itself. Instead, it delves into the history of ancient worship and rituals of women, allowing listeners to redefine their relationship with themselves, God, and the Great Goddess in all her forms. The host provides supportive and integrative tools, feminine embodiment practices, ancestral healing, holistic sexuality, and a touch of magic.

The Good Girl Gone Goddess podcast is a space for women, mothers, dual souls to come as you are and learn to be intimate with life again. It encourages you to embrace your worthiness of fulfillment, ecstasy, prosperity, and peace, as you untangle from your old life and create a new
author_name: U'ilani Tevaga - Feminine Embodiment Coach , Trauma-informed Somatic Healing

title: The Late to Church Podcast
description:
Are you a Catholic/Christian who struggles to feel the same connection to God that your fellow churchgoers describe? Do you struggle to find consistency in prayer and religious life? Do you feel like something's missing when it comes to religion and a relationship with God? The Late to Church Podcast is here to let you know that it's OK. We've been there. We've struggled with everything from literally being 10 minutes late to church every week, to being so far away from God that we're on the brink of totally giving up. We want to help you see the beauty in your struggle, and remind you that God's love for you surpasses any challenges. 

This podcast won't get too theological, but it will compel you to try and see your life through God's eyes. If you're looking for a frank conversation about the practical battles and beauty found in a relationship with Jesus, please join us as we do our best to "step out of the boat."

title: Jiron127 presents Men of God (MoG) podcast
description: Journey into the truth. Via the scriptures, testimonies, dreams, visions, cryptids, research etc

Hosted by Stephanie D'Sa and guests sharing their life experiences, wisdom and guidance from their own spiritual journeys. Spreading truth and light to those who seek it the most. The Divine Feminines support their listeners with authentic and soul enriching conversations about life within a Sacred Space that doesn't look to judge, yet embraces growth and transformation. Humanity needs more of your light. Join the high vibe soul tribe and together shine your light!

description:
A mother and daughter duet where we shoot the shit with magical authenticity.

title: Crazy Pills
description:
“The man has only one look for Christ's sake! Blue Steel? Ferrari? Le Tigra? They're the same face! Doesn't anybody notice this? I feel like I'm taking crazy pills!” – Mugatu (from Zoolander).

Now more than ever, people are waking up to the realization that much of the mainstream narrative is an illusion.  In this podcast, I will be discussing different areas of life where once you see the accepted story for what it is, you'll start to have access to power true freedom of choice in every aspect of your life.

title: Iglesia de Dios Amor Eterno
description:
Somos una Iglesia diferente porque vivimos la palabra, proclamamos la llenura y unción del Espiritu Santo en cada servicio, amamos a todos no importando su condición, predicamos una palabra fresca en cada servicio conforme a la necesidad del pueblo de Dios, te guiaremos y discipulamos conforme a las escrituras para que tengas un crecimiento familiar y eclesiástico saludable conforme a la palabra, cumplimos con nuestra misión de llevar el evangelio a toda criatura, desarrollamos corazones apasionados por Jesus con un amor incondicional y somos UNA iglesia con UNA misión, UNA fe y UN Señor. 
SOMOS IGLESIA DE DIOS AMOR ETERNO.

Welcome to the Street Prophet's podcast. We are here for those of you that are hurting. Jesus said it best in Luke 5:31 "It is not the healthy who need a doctor, but the sick." 

My hope is that this podcast will reach all who God intends to hear it.

description: Centered is an exploration of spiritual practices for everyday life.  We are so glad you are here.  No matter your experience with God, faith, prayer, or spiritual practice, this is a podcast designed for anyone who would like to live life with a little more balance and health, a little more centeredness and less distraction, a little more compassion, and less anxiety.

Two New Yorkers, transplanted in Colorado... Talking about all the things: Love, Life, and Everything in Between! 

Follow us on Instagram: @fortheloveofpunchandallo @paigemackenziek @yogini_allo

description:
Nimm dir deinen Raum. Jetzt! Setz dich hin und gönn Dir ne Pause.
Ich begleite dich mit meiner Stimme.

Achtsamkeitsübungen für mehr Energie im Alltag oder um zur Ruhe zu finden.
Meditation für Dich und dein Herz. Reisen an deinen Erlebnisort Körper.

title: Life and shit
description: A collection of words and thoughts from a spiritual, rap loving, non-neurotypical retired party animal turned personal development junkie, sociology major turned personal trainer turned mindset and self-love coach. Originally from Vancouver Island, Canada, Riley has been exploring the world as a digital nomad and entrepreneur for the past 1.5 years and brings big thoughts, feelings and opinions - and a passion for being raw and real, always. These are authentic, no bullshit conversations around wellness, business, spirituality, mental health, addiction, personal growth, relationships, fitness and nutrition.

title: The Rise Above Podcast
description: Angie and Katrina have been growing in their faith. As two young Catholics, they experienced what a lot of people go through: high and lows of relationships, typical college life, and the questioning of their purpose on earth. But through all of this they maintained one thing, and that is staying true to the faith. In this podcast, they talk about the meaning of staying true to the faith, finding a religious/spiritual community, dating for marriage, and so much more! Whether you are religious or not, we invite everyone to listen with opening ears and hearts as we strive to break societal stereotypes, create a loving community, and spread positive messages. We welcome you to our Rise Above journey and wish you a blessed day! Follow the Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/rise.aboveco/ to stay updated!

title: Galvanized Masculinity
description:
The definition of Galvanize is:"to Shock or excite (someone) into taking action.” This podcast is meant to shock you into action and explore what true masculinity is in a modern age. Stories that inspire. Conversations that spark change. Courage to step out of your comfort zone and enjoy it. 
Learn to become a man that refuses to rust away into insignificance.

title: Guided Meditation for Good Mental Health
description: Welcome to Guided Meditation for Good Mental Health! I am a licensed professional counselor and in these series I combine my 15+ years experience of Sahaja Meditation with my knowledge of counseling to create a short, simple and practical meditation that can be used every day to help you feel relaxed and peaceful.

title: The Laughing Matters Podcast
description:
At the start of 2010's spring semester, APSU student, W.S. Walker walked out of his dorm room in the middle of a blizzard with only two blank books, and lived the next 44 days without any money or ID, going where the wind blew. Because of a single discovery, he stopped everything to walk out into the world, throwing wide open all of his defenses, and making himself completely vulnerable to anyone he met. And what was the discovery which caused this? The massive hidden secret behind what laughter is and why we find something funny.

Have you ever tried to explain why somethings are funny and somethings aren't? Tune in to W. S. Walker's The Laughing Matters, the ground-breaking book, read chapter by chapter by the author (and then all manner of advice, musings, and wisdoms after Season 1), and hang on as he sends you reeling through some of the most incredible discoveries on human behavior, why we don't feel right so much of the time, and the core blueprint for the universal design of happiness; things hidden in plain sight your entire life and answers that you never would have expected. The moment you hear them, you will understand that you've always known them.

The true motivations behind why we laugh will shock you to your core.

A fair bit of warning: once you hear some of the hidden truths, you cannot unhear them. They are night and day obvious once you know which angle to see them from.

This is an advanced edition. The book has not been publicly released yet. If you want a much better understanding of who you are, why you don't feel important, where so much of your internal conflict (at a base-level) comes from, come on in and have a listen.

I've got some good news, and some bad news for you.

youtube.com/couldhelp

www.thelaughingmatters.com

facebook.com/icouldhelp

willhelpmail@gmail.com

description: Crystal Goddess Podcast covers the topics of healing, wellness and art. Hosting the show is Asia Renee a healer, Singer, and CEO of Abundance Box a monthly subscription box for clearing your home and life of negative energies.

title: Uplifting 2020 by Rajeeshwaran Moorthy
description: 2020 is coming to an end (finally right?) but was it a bad year as what we thought? I'm here to uplift that so please join me in listening to Uplifting 2020.

title: Wispit By Angela
description: Wispit by Angela is a podcast designed by an African American female physician for the purpose of giving examples of personal life lessons, experiences, achievements, set backs, and wisps of wisdom.  The goal is to hopefully help someone, anyone, who desires more out of this life. Wispit is not a medical forum, but more of an encapsulation of  the experiences and words of wisdom of many people, some of whom are colleagues and friends, as a time capsule.   In this journey, I will interview people of various ages, gender, race, and socioeconomic status. Although this podcast is designed by a woman, it is not limited simply to women.  It is my hope that anyone, and everyone who tunes in, will be enriched, edified, spiritually touched, and moved to bypass the challenges of life,  and rise from the ashes of this limited existence to a higher elevation of thinking and creativity. Wispit abbreviated stands for Women and Wisdom in Socially Powerful and Interesting Times!  So, Let’s begin this journey together!  After all, we sometimes learn and listen more through the examples of others.

title: Fusion Church Morning SOAP Bible Study
description: Fusion Church's Morning S.O.A.P. Bible Study happens at 6AM on Monday through Friday mornings on ZOOM. This 35-45min study focuses on the SOAP for the day from pastors and teachers of Fusion Church. To find out more + download the daily reading plan, head over to fusionchurch.cc/soap !

title: Double Testimony
description: Every Christian has a story, a testimony of how they came to God. But what is your story of how and why you stayed with God? We decided to ask Christians from different walks of life why they decided to follow God for themselves and what they do to stay committed to that decision--stay planted.

title: A Bahá'í Conversation
description:
In each episode, Anthony and Michael look at a particular dimension of the teachings of the Bahá'í Faith, explore how it relates to ideas in society at large, and discuss how it can serve the needs of humanity today.

Questions, comments? We'd love to hear from you! Abahaiconversation@gmail.com

title: Trust Your Journey
description:
Welcome to my podcast “Trust Your Journey”. My name is Nicky Clarke and I am a Certified Spiritual Life Coach and Mindfulness Coach. I help people connect or reconnect to who they truly are by navigating through limiting beliefs. I empower people pleasers to speak their truth UNAPOLOGETICALLY!
 
My journey began when I was given the gift of becoming an empty nester. After discovering the practice of Mindfulness and Spiritual Life Coaching, my life changed. My journey began when I was given the gift of becoming an empty nester.
 
You have landed here because you may be in need of a deeper meaning of your life, to go deeper and get closer to knowing your true self or just some direction on your journey. Listen and Enjoy as we discover more and more. Together we will learn more about YOU, your life scripts, your understandings with no judgments. Together you will learn how to be more receptive, open, change perspectives, create peace, love, harmony and so much more into your life.
 
If you are interested in mindfulness coaching, feel free to reach out. The sessions are 100% personalized tailored for you, coaching for your MIND, BODY & SOUL empowering you to create the change toward an authentic and fulfilling life.
 
Love & Blessings Always.

WHAT IS MELEVATE?

The pursuit of one who consistently works to elevate themselves to new heights through self love, ongoing personal development, maintaining spiritual alignment, and empowering others.

MELEVATE is my platform where I aspire to bring encouragement and motivation to those looking for inspiration + working to reach those new heights.

MELEVATE encourages you to remain authentic. This is a safe place where you can feel FREE to be YOURSELF. The intent is for you to take what applies to you from the content and implement it in your OWN unique way in your everyday life.

And, we’ll be hearing from special guests from the fields of spirituality, science, the arts, psychology, global wisdom traditions, and embodiment practices. Dream Queen is an advocate of Divine Source in service to the evolution of human consciousness.

I came here to talk about healing.

Sarah has appeared on Gaia TV, Vice TV and the BBC and has now launched her own podcast where she interviews people of influence and spiritual leaders in the awakened community about important subjects such as healing, health, wealth, and connecting to the spirits and realms. Seizoen 5 is een special voor mensen met Fibromyalgie of een ander chronische aandoening. Deze affirmatie serie geeft je nieuwe kracht en energie.

description:
Een podcast over nou ja, van alles. Een podcast die deels zal gaan over seksualiteit en de verschillende vormen van liefde en relaties. Maar ook een podcast die vooral zal gaan over dat je kunt zijn wat je wil zijn.

Mijn naam is Shanice Gillet en als het gaat om de liefde, heb ik wel het een en ander mogen ervaren. Monogame relaties, open relaties en relaties met meerdere personen. Met vrouwen en met mannen. Fijne relaties en minder fijne relaties. 

In deze podcast zal ik je vertellen over mijn ervaringen, spreek ik met verschillende gasten over verschillende onderwerpen en zal ik je meenemen in mijn wereld. Die wereld bestaat uit meer dan alleen bovengenoemde onderwerpen, dus wanneer ik daar zin in heb, zullen er ook zeker andere onderwerpen besproken worden. 
Les'be what the hell we want to be!

title: Tempo de Despertar
description:
Estamos vivendo o despertar de uma nova era. É chegada a hora de muitos véus serem retirados e de muitas ilusões cairem. Estamos num novo alvorecer, onde entraremos num mundo mais regenerado, mais humano e mais feliz. Muitas coisas ainda estão por vir, precisamos estar atentos, aprender a ouvir o nosso coração e trabalhar em relação ao nosso autodesenvolvimento. 

Nosso caminho é longo. Estamos encarnando e desencarnando há milhares de anos neste Planeta. Já sofremos, ferimos e fomos feridos muitas vezes. Agora, é hora de vivermos de uma maneira mais gentil e fraterna, com discernimento e autocontrole. O tempo de vingança e ressentimento já passou. É o momento do perdão e da autodescoberta.

Este podcast tem o propósito de ajudar a todos neste despertar.

Meu nome é Guaraciara Roma, sou Psicóloga, Terapeuta de Vida Passada e Frequências de Brilho. Sou especialista em Cuidados Integrativos pela Unifesp, Life Coach pela Sociedade Brasileira de Coaching. Master em Reiki, Practitioner em Programação Neurolinguística e Membro da Sociedade Brasileira de Neurociência. 

Já tive a oportunidade de cuidar e ajudar mais de 500 pessoas presencialmente em meu consultório e agora, morando na Austrália, estou estendendo esse alcance através da internet.

www.guaraciararoma.com.br -> Conheça mais sobre o meu trabalho!

I am a working professional in corporate america who embraced holistic healing for her emotional wellness. Through my journey, I discovered many easy, practical and time-effective tool to enhance my mental wellness, make better decisions and continue moving towards optimal health.

title: Pari Suhteesta
description:
Pari Suhteesta on Aleksin ja Sandran sukellus parisuhteeseen. Se on sielukas katselmus henkisestä matkasta, jota parisuhde peilaa.  Kuinka miehen ja naisen suhde voi toimia? Kuinka molemmat osapuolet voivat kukoistaa? Kuinka "me" näyttäytyy yksilötasolla ja kuinka "minä" käyttäytyy yhteisellä tasolla? Puhumme rehellisesti tantrisesta seksuaalisuudesta, tunteista ja kasvustamme tässä suhteessa.

Aleksi on kouluttautunut kundaliinijoogaohjaaja. Lisäksi Aleksin henkisiin harjoitteisiin kuuluvat hengitys- ja kehonpainoharjoitteet, laulu, kitaransoitto, leikkimielisyys, vapaa ekstaattinen tanssi sekä suuri rakkaus ja kunnioitus kylmäaltistusta kohtaan. Aleksilla on valtava halu tuoda henkistä syvyyttä länsimaiselle keholle ja mielelle helpommin lähestyttävässä muodossa. Hän on vahva kehorakkauden puolestapuhuja. 

Sandra opiskeli viisi vuotta psykologiaa yliopistossa, kunnes koki itsessään sen, että tie sisäiseen voimaan ja kukoistukseen löytyy länsimaista psykologiaa laajemman kehollisen varjotyöskentelyn, seksuaalisuuden ja sielullisuuden kautta. Niinpä Sandra jätti yliopisto-opinnot kesken ja opiskelee nyt Fertility Awareness- ja Sexual Health Educator :iksi etänä Yhdysvalloista. Sandra tutkii elämää tantran kautta, jossa seksuaalienergia nähdään pyhänä elämänenergiana ja joka tukee kokijaansa löytämään viisauden omasta kehostaan.

Tervetuloa podcastimme pariin!
-Sandra & Aleksi

* Muista seurata meitä myös instagramissa: @pari__suhteesta *

Host Charlotte Kosa is a journalist/photojournalist with more than 25 years experience. She has been the editor of a daily online paper and the assistant editor of a daily paper. She also was a general assignment reporter and crime and courts reporter during her long career.

title: The Fourth Watch: Spiritual Warfare, biblical prophecy and the great commission.
description:
Spiritual Warfare is real and raging around us - while end times prophecy, the Book of Revelations and worldwide culture are colliding on a pace and scale we've never seen before - but were we warned this would happen?  

The Fourth Watch is a group of people from all walks of American life that were looking to go deeper with the Holy Spirit.  We see the world through the lens of Jesus which results in spiritual warfare becoming a chosen lifestyle vs the commonly seen apathetic and lethargic country club church going Christian.

What does that mean to you and I?  To abandon the comfort of living with our eyes closed - to help the church wake up, to see the enemies work all around us for what it is and to remain vigilant, looking for opportunities to engage the enemy in prayer.

There's only one way to stir the church from comfort and lethargy - change your perspective, change your footing on the full measure of the word, pray for wisdom and discernment and ask the Lord to show you how you're called righteous indignation and Holy Spirit inspired anger.  

Ephesian armor was meant for everyone which means all of us are called to battle - but some of us are called to war.  Journey with us as we discuss the ways we choose to see and engage in Spiritual Warfare, and listen along as we challenge each other and discuss how to change our collective Christian footing before revival on the way up becomes revival on the way down.

We love the church and we want to see it become the Biblical foundation this country was founded on - but we also know at some point the cultural church will vilify and hunt down Holy Spirit filled Christ followers as they work to fulfill the Anti-Christ's agenda and purpose.

This isn't your normal, average watered down Christian podcast - but we encourage you to engage and test everything we say against the Holy Spirit, and to find your place as a watchman on the walls as Christ prepares us for His return.

God Bless and Godspeed

title: Kindness Rebellion
description: Rebellions are categorized by a rejection and opposition to oppressive authority. Historically and traditionally rebellions have required brute force and savagery, the same tools utilized by the oppressors in question. Perhaps it is possible to reject oppression through kindness instead and perhaps this can only be done through a shared understanding of what it means to exist. In this podcast I intend to reject our modern day oppressors by communicating with as many people as I can in order to develop an understanding of all view points in order to unify humanity towards a common goal. Join me as we explore the wonders of infinite consciousness and develop meaningful relationships along the way.

Denne podcast er til dig der gerne vil inspireres til at turde besøge alle livets facetter. Den er til dig, der somme tider føler dig alene i det svære. title: mustaza
description: As followers of Jesus, we are called to give by grace what we have received by grace. Whether that be through small messages, testimonials, deeper looks at specific Bible passages, or however the Holy Spirit guides us to do so, we believe that through this podcast you will encounter God, feel God, hear God... If you would only have faith as small as a mustaza seed, nothing would be impossible for you (Matthew 17:20). ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ Como seguidores de Cristo estamos llamados a dar por gracia lo que por gracia hemos recibido. Ya sea por pequeños mensajes, testimonios, pequeños estudios sobre pasajes Bíblicos específicos o como sea que nos guíe el Espíritu Santo, creemos que a través de este podcast serás edificado, bendecido y sentirás y escucharas la voz de Dios. Si tuvieras la fe del tamaño de una semilla de mustaza, nada seria imposible para ti (Mateo 17:20).

title: Meditace a afirmace by Joga Dealer
description:
Všechno, co často slyšíme a vidíme, se stává naší realitou.
Čím častěji něco slyšíme, tím více tomu věříme.
A pak jednáme na základě toho, čemu právě věříme, a tvoříme svoji vlastní realitu. To, co v životě (ne)máme je výsledkem naších hlubokých postojů. Žádná magie. Jen mozková činnost. 
Je proto velmi důležité obklopovat se pozitivními věcmi.
Tento podcast je pro všechny, kdo si přeje psát hezký scénář svého života. 
Abyste dosáhli výsledků, poslouchejte každou konkrétní nahrávku s afirmacemi každý den po dobu 1 měsíce a potupně tyto pozitivní postoje nahradí vaše zastaralé způsoby myšlení, které již nepotřebujete.

title: Dharma Things Podcast
description:
Life is full of obstacles, misconceptions, misguided ideas, and on the flipside amazing teachings and practices to balance it all out. The Dharma Things podcast gives people with experiences and explanations on life a voice, and pushes us to realise we are all often of the same thinking and experience. Sometimes unthought of perspectives, sometimes unaccepted ideas. It's all in there.

My name is Miz DeShannon, and in curating the podcast I'll be gathering many conversations with people I respect and admire. People from different backgrounds, ethnicities, genders, whose stories and experiences cross similar subjects; ancestry, belonging, discovery, self-development.

The common thread though – Dharma. My hope is that in these sessions you can find some guidance towards your Dharma, some refuge, or respite, knowledge, or pure joy….

title: High Frequency Females
description: High Frequency Females is a space in time for women who are trying to live a life of a higher vibration. A space where women can be unapologetic for being their true and authentic selves and speak their truth with conviction, free of judgement and pressure. I'll be talking to incredible women who are experts in their fields, such as psychologists, poets, personal trainers even reiki healers, psychics and yoga teachers. Women who can guide us on our life's journey. I'll also be having conversations with women who have lived real and emotional experiences. Experiences we need to humanise and bring light to. Areas and problems in society which aren’t always discussed publicly whether it's from shame or embarrassment. I want to create safe space for women to take their power back. We all have so much to learn, we need to learn to support each other and raise our vibrations as a collective, because we're all living this human experience. Living a life at a higher frequency is a place I want all women to live, and to have the strength to empower ourselves to start living the life we want and the life which we deserve. Welcome to the High Frequency Females Podcast. Xxxx

title: Just Johnny Joy: The Podcast
description:
What is JOY? 

J O Y, a noun, a feeling of great pleasure and happiness. But what if JOY was a noun, a verb & an adjective? We could be finding JOY! Being JOY! Doing JOY!

JOY can be so many things. I’m in JOY when I dance. I’m giving JOY when I am of service to others. I’m finding JOY in the little moments like washing dishes, walking my dogs, listening to a friend. JOY is everything. 

I can’t wait to share with you all that I am learning. I can’t wait for you to learn how others are finding joy, being joy and doing joy. 

Let’s have some fun and start this joyous journey together!

title: The Sun, The Moon & The TRUTH
description:
Welcome to The Sun, The Moon & The TRUTH podcast, a series of in-depth conversations that create space for messy, playful and challenging conversations about yoga and life and the places where the two meet. 

Join us (Karina Guthrie and Natalie Backman, yogini’s and yoga teacher trainers) in our quest to understand yoga's role in uncovering the universal truths woven into the fabric of tradition, society and culture.

Speaking to well-rounded guests from the yoga community, we pull back the veil on eye-opening issues that exist in the yoga industry today. 

In these vulnerable and thought-provoking conversations, you’ll learn what inspired us to begin practicing and why we choose to devote ourselves to the practice everyday by living these teachings from the inside-out.

If you’re looking for a podcast that is spiritual and insightful whilst remaining empowering and inspiring, you’ll want to add this to your list!

title: Remarkably Us
description: In this podcast we’re stripping the bullshit and getting down to the unfiltered parts of life through raw, authentic, and often difficult conversations. We’re talking about resilience, about picking yourself up from some extreme lows and rising stronger. Through my personal journey of self discovery, and sobriety, I’ve learned and continue to learn what it takes to get up and stay up. We’re sharing stories and all of the tools collected in maintaining a consistent environment for self growth, love and discovery. We’ll hear from others who are breaking barriers and climbing incredibly tough mountains. Connection matters, stories matter and without that we are nothing. So, get ready to get inspired and motivated, to laugh and to cry. But most importantly, to love a little.

title: Jaké chceš Česko
description: Máme rádi Česko a lidi v něm. Rádi se bavíme a diskutujeme s těmi, kteří spolu s námi tvoří a dělají Česko krásnějším. Je jich tu spousta a jsou vlídní, jsou milí, přistupují k druhým a k sobě s respektem. Radují se, i když to neumí stále, tak se po většinu času radují. A s těmi, kteří tvoří a kteří jsou OPRAVDOVÝMI TVŮRCI tady mluvíme, diskutujeme, hledáme hodnoty, které jsou podstatné jako respekt, soucit, VLÍDNOST, pochopení, slušnost. A o tom vždy mluvíme, ne vždy naplno, ale jsou tam. Ve slovech našich hostů jsou slyšet. Pokud je chcete s námi hledat. Být spontánní. Něco se přiučit. Přidat se k nám, tak jste vítáni. V komentářích, v podnětech a v tvorbě. Tak můžeme vytvořit prostředí, které bude založené na vzájemné spolupráci. Pokud byste měli zájem nás podpořit, tak nám uděláte radost, když si nakoupíte čokolády nebo knihu moderátora Petra Kovaříka na https://eshop.prazskacokolada.cz/, protože bez podpory čokoládovny by toto nevzniklo. #jakechcescesko ? #mluvimeotom

Through a series of meditations and channelings, we have discovered our deep connection that has spanned lifetimes and beyond. We are coming together with our Ascended Masters, Spirit Guides, Higher Self, Angels, and many others to answer your questions, talk about the metaphysical, share stories of magic, and speak of the life behind the veil. We sincerely hope you delight in the experiences we are sharing here.

title: Conscious Rebellion with Samantha Sacchi
description:
It often feels humanity has gone a bit astray. I get it. What are we doing here? I’m Samantha Sacchi from The Self Club. I always knew life was this temporary experience- a soul in a borrowed physical body, I wasn’t sure why so many people spent so much time on things that don’t matter at all. I get it now, they just didn’t know. They were all still asleep. 

I’m deep and have been writing, philosophizing, and trying to understand life since I’m 10. I moved 18 times across 4 continents by the age of 28, which also made me question pretty much everything. My background is in International Economics and Business, Leadership Development and Emotional Intelligence. I've studied from neuro-linguistic programming​, to Reiki and Akashic records, to natural and holistic nutrition to look at life from a truly holistic perspective​. 

This podcast is a conscious rebellion to shift from a ​fear-based system that keeps us small and doubtful to a way of living based on truth, trust and love as we access our own innate wisdom. A new paradigm that starts with radical self-awareness, a new educational system and a conscious way of being human - combining ancient wisdom with modern knowledge. I'll be hosting and bringing you conversations with conscious souls that are part of this shift. 

This new paradigm starts with you.

title: Las ideas nos buscan! Me lo dijo Elizabeth Gilbert
description:
En este podcast nos dedicaremos a analizar las maravillas que Elizabeth Gilbert habla sobre la creatividad: qué es, de donde viene, por qué las personas la buscamos, y por qué la cultura en que vivimos nos ha llevado a tantos a bloquearla. 

El hecho de estar acá en la tierra hace que todas las personas seamos seres creativos, sin embargo, llevar a cabo nuestra creatividad siempre exige un difícil diálogo con su contrincante: el miedo. En este podcast veremos las formas en que el miedo se presenta, por qué nos quiere cancelar la creatividad, y cuales son los lugares desde donde las personas sacamos la fuerza para llevar a cabo las cosas que queremos crear.

title: Mental Awakening Podcast
description:
A podcast hosted by Mental Health Social Worker and Psychotherapist Sarah Dakhili, exploring topics related to trauma recovery, chronic pain (TMS) and healing. Sarah is also a speaker, author and an artist, who is a a huge advocate for health and healing. She has been working within the mind body sector for over a decade and currently runs a private practice in Brisbane, Australia where she supports people through chronic pain, trauma recovery and various mental, physical and emotional challenges. Furthermore, Sarah has over 30 years of personal experience with TMS and trauma and believes that they are connected. 

In her podcast, she explores the healing journey by sharing of her own experiences and knowledge on the topic, incorporating topics such as the trauma body, the relationship between TMS and trauma, the wounded inner child, building a newfound conscious relationship with Self, the power of belief, managing the ego, the importance of boundaries and many more.

To connect with Sarah please visit www.mentalawakening.com.au

Join us each episode as we pull up the hood on why we do what we do with let's grow together as we uncover new areas of our lives that could benefit from an unlearning.

De Podcast afleveringen worden opgenomen in het kerkgebouw Lachai Roi. Het kerkgebouw staat in de Molukse wijk te Alphen aan den Rijn. 
Tukar Pikiran, de Podcast is een plek waar we gedachtes wisselen over het geloof met diverse gasten. In de Podcast komen; stellingen, vragen en de Bijbelvers van de dag aan bod. Hopelijk kunnen wij jullie inspireren met de gesprekken die hieruit voortkomen.

title: Rev. Errol B. Bhola of Harvest Time Ministries North Miami teaches from the Word
description:
Rev. Errol B. Bhola shares the Word of God to a hurting world. The members and friends of the Harvest Time Assembly of North Miami, Florida are happy to share with you the weekly messages from our Bible Studies. Be encouraged, be blessed and take heart. In these trying days, more and more people are dealing with various difficult issues of a personal, business, health, community or environmental nature. God is our only hope. Have faith in God and trust him to be the answer that you need.

Rev. Errol B. Bhola is a pastor, teacher and gospel minister who has been preaching the Word for 60+ years. He hails from Guyana, South America and has travelled extensively as a minister, missionary and church executive to North America, South America, Central America, the Caribbean, Europe, Asia and the Middle East. He has been active at both the national and international levels of church leadership, and served as the General Superintendent of the Assemblies of God in Guyana for over 20 years before relocating to North Miami, Florida. He founded and co-pastors Harvest Time Assembly in North Miami with his wife of over 60 years, Pastor Yvonne C. Bhola. They have 5 wonderful children, 14 grandchildren and 6 great-grandchildren. 

Pastor Bhola continues to preach the Word of God in season and out of season as it remains the main way to point other to Christ and give hope to tired and weary souls.

The ministry of Harvest Time Assembly reaches people all over the world. These weekly messages go into homes in Guyana, Barbados, England, across the USA (Florida, Texas, California, New Jersey, Connecticut, Georgia, New York), Canada and elsewhere. Wherever there are people who crave the true Word of God and want to learn more to increase their faith, find hope, help and healing, and desire to nurture their souls, the Word of the Lord will be taught and will reach all hearts that yearn for him.
Share this podcast with your friends and family. God is still in the saving business. His arms are outstretched to receive all who are weary, to give them rest. 

Be blessed!

title: Códigos de Liberdade
description:
Nesse podcast, Amanda fala de insights, mensagens, diálogos sobre bloqueios pessoais e traz convidados para falar sobre maneiras de reiniciar sua vida de maneira autêntica.

Amanda morou 10 anos nos Estados Unidos onde ela viveu a maioria de sua vida adulta, o que a condicionou de viver afastada da maneira mais alinhada para ela. Vindo de uma industria criativa, porém muito corporativa, ela identifica criatividade em tudo que vive. Criatividade significa autenticidade, e autenticidade vem da conexão com seu próprio ser. Amanda aprendeu que ao se libertar de condicionamentos, ela encontrou os códigos necessários para conexão com sua mais verdadeira forma de expressão.

Instagram: @codigosdeliberdade
Amanda Kunrath: @amandacocreates

title: Dialog Suwung
description:
Renungan puisi-puisi sakral untuk para perindu Tuhan.

Selamat datang para sahabat Suluk Suwung. Selamat datang di podcast Dialog Suwung ini bersama Pardamean Harahap dan Denny Turner.

Podcast ini lahir dari rekaman sesi-sesi mingguan instagram live di akun IG @suluksuwung. 

Kami berdua adalah sahabat spiritual yang bertemu awal tahun 2000an, dan bersahabat hingga sekarang. Berawal dari berguru kepada mursyid tariqah masing-masing, kami terus menjelajahi kedalaman kasih Ilahi dalam hidup keseharian.

Dalam konteks tasawuf, suwung mengandung makna kekosongan, makna kesadaran berketuhanan. Sering juga dimaknai dengan kata ma’rifat.
 
Kami melakukan dialog, renungan spontan di setiap sesinya. Tema pokok di setiap sesi adalah puisi sakral, ataupun sistematika inspiratif, yang kami gali dari berbagai tradisi.

Melalui dialog spontan ini, kami berkomunikasi dari hati ke hati dengan anda semua. Energi kita semua, adalah doa agar kita dihantarkan oleh Tuhan, menuju Tuhan.

Dialog ini dihadiahkan kepada sesama pejalan yang senantiasa rindu akan Tuhan.

Opening up the throat chakra by speaking on all curiosities and synchronicities. What does it mean to live a "spiritual life" ? What is a spiritual awakening? What does the term mystic mean to you? Do you share your spiritual beliefs & experiences? Why is it scary to speak your truth? How do you go inward? What does it mean to protect your energy?

title: Power Through Healing
description:
Power Through Healing is all about supporting your inner evolution. Simply put, aligning with your highest potential means being able to offer your highest level of contribution to our world. 

Episodes are created to promote healing, self-empowerment, and conscious evolution. Amanda shares her own personal experiences, insights, and occasional frustrations. Guests who come on the show share practical resources, guidance, and inspiration to move you along in your own healing journey. 

It’s time to take back your power and heal for maximum impact. Our world needs you!

title: THE GREAT BREAK: the podcast you don't want to hear!
description:
Our world is undergoing a massive awakening and its during this time many people are confused, scared and unsure about the stability we can offer future generations. As a collective we have been given a great opportunity in the midst of destruction. It is in this chaos of change and destruction is where we can wake up to our fullest potential! 

Those who are having a "GREAT BREAK" are seeking new ways of living and being but don't know where to start. If you have a deep desire  to enhance your self autonomy and  to finally have a say in co-creating what most people desire; peace on earth, love, a healthy lifestyle and freedom to move, live and express oneself without judgments, this podcast will touch on many topics that will be your guiding light in such dark times.

The Great Break touches on various topics that surpasses mainstream societal perceptions and belief systems by seeking the interconnective links and synchronicities  in all things verses indifferences and separation consciousness. This includes marrying mysticism, science, religions, ancient medicines, sexuality, tribal rituals, psychology, health and fitness and much more.

It's time to enhance and expand our collective consciousness by breaking free from mind influencing conditionings of who we once believed to be and to begin finding the commonalities in one another to empower each of us of who we are truly meant to be... All powerful, empathic loving, expressive and creative human beings.

Looking to grow her spiritual community, Cara decided to curate a space where we hear from witches, curanderas, esoterics, mystics, and shamans from many backgrounds, cultures, and countries. Topics include past life work, ancestral lineage exploration, astral travel, plant and flower medicines, lucid dreaming, planes of consciousness, different types of meditation practices, omens & talismans, spell-work, grounding, cosmos and moon cycles, archetypes, the Enneagram, and the afterlife. description: What is The B.O.N.E.? This is a question Zach and Francesco have been getting ever since they had the idea to create a podcast together. The answer? The B.O.N.E. is an acronym for Beginning Of No End, which symbolizes a holistic lifestyle of health, happiness, and overall growth. This provokes the question, "What does the Beginning Of No End mean?" Well, Zach and Francesco invite you to listen as both co-hosts dive deep into a wide variety of topics that glimpse into what The B.O.N.E. lifestyle is all about.

title: Curious and Curiouser with Robin Johnson: A Great Mystery Podcast Series
description:
Curious and Curiouser features Great Mystery co-founder Robin Johnson in conversation with leading thinkers of our time. Exploring fields as diverse as shamanism, energy healing, sound, near-death experiences, and animal communication, we encounter ideas that ripple through the imagination and help us transform our personal lives and our world.

From our first weekend workshop on Maui, Hawaii in 1993 with Carlos Castaneda, Great Mystery has presented engaging conferences, online events, and exceptional tours to ancient sites to foster feelings of hope and connection.

https://greatmystery.org

title: Up The Vibe
description: Hello and welcome to the Up The Vibe podcast. I am Joe Hodgson and I will be having discussions various other collaborators on consciousness, UFOs, dimensions, ET races and all manner of topics that are of interest. The last few years have been rather eye opening for me and I have been down many bizarre rabbit holes as I try to discover the truth about who we are, how it all began and what is the true nature of reality. On this journey I have also become more and more aware of how important it is for us all to up the vibe and raise our consciousness so that we are not caught up in continuous cycles of war and division anymore. Instead, we can look forward to a future of peace and unity which will in time allow us to become a galactic species. There are many forces working extremely hard to stop our planetary ascension but by having these discussions and by opening our minds to a myriad of amazing possibilities for humanity, we can ensure our paths are towards the light and not the dark. I hope you will enjoy listening to our discussions, we are a group of individuals that found each other with the CE5 protocols which are becoming more and more popular as people want to know more about our place in the universe and whether there is intelligent life out there in the cosmos. Although Steven Greer's CE5 protocols have brought us together and we have had some success dipping our feet in initiating contact with other intelligent beings, it has also been a great way to bring together like minded individuals who are spiritual, open minded and eager to help in any way they can to assist humanity in its path to ascension.

title: On The Verge
description:
Oxford University students/alumni Ali-Reza Omidvar, Kenneth Shinozuka & David Leon explore the edges of consciousness & spirituality, bridging science, spirituality, mysticism, poetry, and art. To support our Podcast & Videos visit:  https://www.patreon.com/OnTheVerge_Oxford

Ali-Reza Omidvar is an Oxford Philosophy & Theology Graduate who has a deep love for the study of consciousness. Early on in his life, he was influenced by Islamic mystics & poets like Rumi & Hafiz. He is also the Directing Manager & Co-Founder of Inoox.com, an AI-assisted management startup based in London. 

David Leon is a former Google employee and current Librarian of the Oxford Centre for Buddhist Studies. His writing can be found at davidleon.blog

Kenneth Shinozuka is a DPhil in Psychiatry at the University of Oxford, where he conducts research on the neuroscience of psychedelics. He is also the president of the Oxford Psychedelic Society.
author_name: Ali-Reza Omidvar, Kenneth Shinozuka & David Leon

title: Emancipated
description:
This 5 part series is hosted by the fabulous KC Armstrong which originally aired on the Podcast Business News Network (PBN).  

I am thankful for the opportunity to have connected with KC and for PBN gifting me with these episodes so that I can share them with you! 

Each episode we reveal more about me and how I got to this beautiful place in my life - from Pentagon employee to Reiki Master, Author and Speaker! We discuss the many the services provide to support your connection with you soul, building your spiritual toolkit and the support I provide to your animals! 

We also discuss my two books, "The Adventures of Cleo and Sophie - Trip to the Moon" and "Enslaved - The Lady and Her Pentagon".

I am thankful for this series as I now continue on my own reaching others and providing support and healing around the world! 

From here forward we will discuss how to free ourselves from the lives we have enslaved ourselves in and how to live abundant limitless lives with alternative healing and Ayurveda practices!

title: Relationship Over Religion
description: Join Sylvia, a graduate from the school of hard knocks w/ a master's degree in all things Christ and what it means to walk with Him daily. Listen to the crazy shenanigans that happen to me as I simply try to live my life with my spiritual eyes open. Called to be a beacon of light in my community, the days are dark and glib, but through the power of the Holy Spirit - I am able to keep my peace and learn from each new experience. Each episode will contain vital information from my own spiritual journey that I pray gives you hope for your own personal and spiritual growth.

title: Universal Spirit
description: We will explore the spirituality of cultures, and religions all over the world. We will talk with spiritual teachers, psychics, witches male and female, and share all paranormal and unexplained events. Learning a bit about what you don't know, will help you see better the things you do know.

title: Mental Health & Magic Meditations
description:
Carrie Pokorney is a yoga facilitator, energy worker, and teacher of gentleness & peace.  Inspired by her observations in nature, psychology, her own inner struggles, and encounters with human beings, Carrie has taken wedges of her heart and jarred them into meditations to help others find grounding and inner peace.

This podcast remains free (and ad-free) and takes many hours to write and produce. If you are enjoying these meditations and would like to support me, there are a few ways you can do so:

1) Add money to my tip jar. My Venmo is @Carrie-Pokorney
2) Share these meditations with your friends or on your social page
3) Donate to "I Grow Chicago" - a non profit organization dedicated to supporting the neighborhood of Englewood in thriving through community connection, skill building, and opportunity 

Stay tuned every Monday for a new meditation.

The Podcast hopes to give insight, as well as correct the many negative stereotypes about IFA and the Orisa's by educating "young" people about IFA and the Orisa's.

Join us weekly as we wrestle with how to live for eternity in our relationships, ambitions, and time.

description:
Hello you!

My name is Lila & I am a life coach supporting those creating a New Earth. I am all about love, oneness, regeneration, holistic health, systems thinking & soulful, authentic, natural living! I help people to connect deeply with themselves so they can live fully and freely as they are, live their life's purpose, and share their medicine with the world.

IG & TikTok: @divine.play.coaching

title: Healing From The Holy Land
description:
In this podcast series I explore various aspects of holistic healing, as an Intuitive Healer experiencing the world and the healing energies around us.
We will touch on, and go in-depth about, many topics - including Meridians, Chakras, Yin Yang energy, self-healing techniques, Flower Essences, Meditations, Guided Imagery, Color Healing, and the effect of the cosmos on individuals and the world via zodiac signs and other cosmic events (moon phases, eclipses, meteor showers and the like). Content is intuitively guided and so what comes up is what I will be talking about!
Often, if not always, content reflects what is going on in my own personal healing journey, or what I see coming up for those around me, or both.
Here's a bit about me and my background:
I was born in America and lived there for just over two decades before I moved to Israel with my family over 20 years ago. 
I am a Holistic Healer with over ten years of experience practicing CranioBalance Therapy, have a thriving range of Flower Essences (Beit Roga Gardens*) made from flowers, trees, and elements in my home community in Israel, as well as from the Dead Sea, and run a private practice called Beit Roga* (House of Tranquility). I have learned many other holistic healing techniques along the way, and all my healing is done on an intuitive level. (*Check out more at beitroga.com and beitroga.com/shop)
I started out as a Physical Therapist and quickly learned that I was healing via intuitive feedback. I also recognized that simply dealing with the physical aspect of a client's pain or dysfunction was not dealing with the whole picture. 
Over the years I have trusted my inner knowing and followed my intuitive guidance to learning more and more about holistic healing, and most importantly, to trusting the information that comes to me intuitively. It all links back together and each time I learn another aspect of healing I am amazed anew at all the inter-connections. It all comes from one Source, and that is made clear over and over again. 
We are living in exciting, magical times when more and more healing is coming up to the surface. Old healing practices coming back to modern day use, intuitive guidance on the rise in peoples' awareness, holistic healing becoming more and more popular with the general population, and a greater forum expanding globally for all this information to come to light.

description:
Hosts Sarrah and Jasmine create a conversational journey as they take on unchartered territories of what is to become a 'New Human' through all topics Mind-Body-Spirit. 

The hosts' life-long, personal, metaphysical and extra-sensory events alongside decades of spiritual practice provide  a  springboard for all-encompassing and unlikely discussions based around the purpose and machinations of existence, through the merging of Science and Spirit as we transform into our personal and collective human evolution through Ascension. 

Sarrah and Jasmine take turns each week opening the discussion for anything and everything related to becoming a New Human.

Beyond Darwin’s evolve or die hypothesis of survival of the fittest, humanity has done a fantastic job of survival, but with little regard to the expense of the planet, our health, each other, and our soul’s intended journey of spiritual awakening into love and unity consciousness. 

The next evolution of human development can not mimic the past, nor do most of us want it to. As the rest of the world weighs out the long-planned Great Reset, the New Human challenges that the greatest transformation of humanity will take place on the inside first. We explore the paradigms of spiritual practice, dogma, societal mass consciousness and its ongoing programming, and propose new ways to discover our own deepest truths. We learn how to discover a deeper resonance beyond our five senses.

From Med-Beds to Frequency Medicine, Extra-Terrestrial civilizations to using the human body as a frequency antennae, spirituality, oneness, ancient wisdom leading to full-energetic awakening, the sky’s the limit as we conceptualize together, the latest discoveries and ideas that will transform the progress of the human race in the way it was always intended - a more natural and connected soul-driven evolution. 

We’ve all heard about the New Earth. Let’s take the journey together to uncover this new human that will thrive as it brings forth its Golden Age, ensuring that the next human evolution is for the betterment of all.

~ Hosts, Jasmine Sterling and Sarrah Powell
~ Original Music by permission of artist Ray McGeehan   https://amzn.to/3M3MPKg

title: The Apostles Corner
description:
Christian... A title synonymous with son's of God. But many that carry the title more than lack in their abilities to reflect the attributes given of God. Unfortunately Christianity as a whole has failed to be evidence of the Glory of God among men, but this was the first thing that Christ did in all His works. So how could we possibly declare the deity of the word made flesh and fail to reflect all that he made possible in us? 

   From one end of God's word to the other, we were warned of the short comings that would befall much of the body of Christ. This is the venue designed to give revelation of the elements that have effectually hindered us from walking as Son's of the most high. The question is what will you do once you know the truth? 
   In the call of a modern day Apostle it is imperative that my actions and intent clearly manifest honor of all that God is. Moreover I declare nothing of myself except that I must be subject to the directives of His Holy Spirit.  For even as in times past, a true Apostle must glorify God in all of his endeavors. The mandate to point the hearts of man back to Father God is the sole purpose of my ministry efforts. A messenger need not prove a thing, God will reveal Himself. That is to all who dare to truly seek Him.
   Change isn't a hard thing at all. the problem is accepting that there is a need for change. If you can muster the revelation of your own hidden motives, I can guarantee that the teachings to be found here will be a great assistance in finding the launch pad for change in your own life.

description: Marc believes humans are amazing critters and has spent a lifetime building relationships with amazing, brilliant people who are passionate about human excellence and the pursuit in what fires them up. title: Bill Crockett: Touch of the Master's Hand
description:
The "Touch of the Master's Hand" is a Christian poem written in 1921 by Myra Brooks Welch. It is depicted in the painting by Ken Brooks used in our Podcast cover art. It tells of an old, battered violin that is about to be sold as the last item in an auction. The highest bid was $3. When suddenly a man in the back of the auction hall walked to the front of the building, took the violin from the auctioneer, wiped off the dust, tuned it and began to play. As he played, the patrons could hardly believe that such a melody could come from such a battered instrument. The violinist finished playing, handed the instrument back to the auctioneer, and walked back to his seat. Amazed and astonished the auctioneer softly said, "Now how much am I bid for this violin?" Instead of $3, the violin was sold for $3,000. The crowd asked, "What was it that suddenly brought value to such a battered instrument?" The auctioneer replied, "It was the touch of the master's hand!" The poem goes on to draw the analogy between the violin and a person whose life has been battered and torn by sin. Just as the master violinist brought value to the old violin, Jesus, our Creator, the Master of the universe and lover of our soul, will make our lives valuable, no matter how battered we may be!

Bill Crockett has a masters degree in Biblical Exposition and has served as an evangelist, pastor, counsellor and Bible Conference speaker across the US and in many countries. Bill also worked in corporate sales and sales management for almost 25 years. Having experienced divorce, the loss of a job, death of an immediate family member and depression to the point of suicide, he understands the ups and downs of life. At one point feeling as if God did not love or care about him, he discovered the true meaning of a personal walk with God and found renewed purpose and value as God touched his life once again!

"Touch of the Master's Hand" is a podcast sharing practical truths from the Bible that will help us realize our value and live productive and fulfilled lives as we are touched by the truth of God's Word.

title: Talk It Out Sessions w/ Trinity
description:
Join us on a transformative journey where spirituality, psychology, and life intersect, offering profound insights and practical guidance for personal development and holistic well-being.

In each episode, we delve into the depths of spiritual growth, exploring the rich tapestry of ancient wisdom and contemporary practices. Our expert hosts share their experiences, knowledge, and perspectives to help you navigate the intricate pathways of your inner world.

Through engaging discussions and interviews, we explore how spirituality and psychology intertwine, shedding light on the profound influence they have on our mental, emotional, and spiritual well-being. Discover how the power of mindfulness, meditation, and self-reflection can enhance your psychological and mental health, fostering resilience, balance, and inner peace.

We delve into the intricacies of spiritual practices, offering practical advice on how to integrate them seamlessly into your daily life. Whether it's exploring the art of meditation, harnessing the transformative energy of affirmations and visualizations, or uncovering the secrets of energy healing, our episodes provide a treasure trove of techniques and tools for personal growth.

Moreover, we believe that spiritual growth extends beyond the individual, affecting our relationships, communities, and the world at large. We explore how nurturing our spirituality can positively impact our interactions, empathy, and compassion towards others, fostering a harmonious existence in this interconnected web of life.

"Talk it out sessions w/ trinity" is your trusted companion on the path to self-discovery and holistic well-being. Tune in, open your heart and mind, and let us guide you toward a more meaningful and fulfilling life. Embrace the transformative journey of merging spirituality, psychology, and life, as we navigate the depths of the human experience together.

title: Redeemed Through His Blood
description: Many of us have a faulty perception. We think that redemption works like a checking account—make as many deposits as we can and when we come up short, borrow what we need from Jesus to make up the difference. The truth is - we make no deposits, and we need no loans. We have been redeemed by Him. He paid the price and the ransom for our souls—all of it, in full, for all of us—with His blood. Living the gospel of Jesus Christ is not about earning our salvation, a concept that only leads to frustration and failure. Living the gospel of Jesus Christ is about choosing daily to qualify for His gift that He freely offers us, by relying wholly on Him. The gospel is a system of redemption. The gospel is not a system to promote the assimilation of virtuous habits and the accumulation of good deeds—all people can achieve worthy goals and live good lives. In Redeemed Through His Blood, we learn how others have experienced redemption and we discuss how each of us may access the power of Christ and His Atonement, which will bring His joy and His peace into our lives.

title: The Bright Light Podcast
description:
The Bright Light podcast was created to encourage you to stop dimming your light and help to empower your true, authentic self. 

I am your host, Ali, and I am an intuitive coach, healer, and medium. I created this podcast so listeners could have a safe space to let their guard down and get in touch with their true selves. 

I was the biggest people pleaser who matched my energy to those around me because I thought that was the way to figure out what made me happy. Turns out, I just needed to get in touch with who I truly am and what I desire in this life. Now I am no longer a people pleaser, and am able to live my life more authentically to who I am. 

I have created my business through using my intuitive abilities to help others realize who tf they are. I am taking you through the lessons I have learned throughout this journey and the lessons I have yet to learn.

If you are looking for a podcast that is raw, real, full of love, acceptance, and life lessons, you've found it. Thank you for being on this journey with me.

title: Conscious Acts of Change
description:
Embarking on a Journey of Transformation: The Conscious Acts of Change Weekly Podcast

Embark upon a voyage of enlightenment as we welcome you to the realm of the Conscious Acts of Change Podcast. Here, a tapestry of thought-provoking dialogues, inspiring narratives, and introspective explorations unfolds before you every week. Our canvas spans the domains of personal and spiritual evolution, family enrichment, and the tapestry of health and well-being. Prepare to traverse the landscapes of innovation, revelation, and boundless potential as we guide you on a journey toward the transformation of your life.

The Oasis of Insights and Exploration: Unveiling New Horizons

Within the corridors of this podcast, a sanctuary of insights and explorations awaits. Each week, we unveil a mosaic of novel ideas, strategic paradigms, and boundless vistas for the enhancement of your lifestyle choices—choices that harbor the power to mend and metamorphose your existence.

Crafting the Tapestry of Transformation: A Call to Embrace Change

Give way to the art of metamorphosis; usher in the new as the old takes its leave. The template that once defined your life has evolved, become antiquated—an artifact of yesteryears. Within the annals of this podcast, you are summoned to construct a fresher, more vibrant quality of life—a life that resonates with the harmony and abundance you inherently deserve.

Prepare to be immersed in dialogues that traverse the landscapes of self-reinvention, family dynamics, and holistic well-being. Engage with narratives that spur thought, kindle inspiration, and catalyze introspection. As the tapestry of each episode unfurls, you shall be guided toward the threshold of change—an epoch where transformation is not just an aspiration, but an inevitable evolution.

As you immerse yourself in the realms of the_ Conscious Acts of Change Podcast_, anticipate the whispers of change and the echoes of renewal—whispers that beckon you to create the life you yearn for, to transcend the bounds of the past, and to embrace the symphony of your own transformation.

title: The Handmaiden Podcast
description:
You may be wondering, why 'The Handmaiden'?​

Being unmarried, Mary questioned the purpose of her role when the angel Gabriel visited Mary to deliver God's message that she would have a son. But, after the angel reassured her that there was nothing to fear, Mary claimed the message as her own:

And Mary said, "Behold the handmaid of the Lord; be it unto me according to thy word. And the angel departed from her." —Luke 1:38 (KJV)

Claiming her own role as a servant of God, Naema knew "The Handmaiden" perfectly suited her & her mission to continue sharing wisdom, positivity, and light with those who need it most.

Hear more at https://www.youtube.com/c/NaemaLavern

title: The Tailored Healing Collective Podcast
description:
The Tailored Healing Collective podcast is a platform for our team of experts to share their knowledge and insights about various topics related to healing and wellness. Each episode features a different expert, who shares their expertise in areas such as mental health, nutrition, yoga, mindfulness, and more.

Our podcast is designed to help listeners gain a deeper understanding of the connection between physical, emotional, and spiritual well-being, and how they can work together to promote overall health and healing. We believe that by listening to our podcast, you will gain valuable insights and practical tips that you can apply to your own life to improve your overall health and well-being.

Our guests are carefully selected based on their expertise and experience in their respective fields, ensuring that each episode provides valuable and relevant information for our listeners. Whether you are looking to improve your mental health, develop a stronger sense of purpose and meaning in life, or simply learn more about holistic healing practices, our podcast has something for everyone.

Overall, our podcast is an extension of our mission to provide personalized and compassionate care to our clients, and to help people live happier and healthier lives. We hope that you will tune in and join us on this journey towards greater health and wellness.

title: Journeys to Mt Shasta
description:
Updated on June 28, 2022
personal links

YouTube >>> https://www.youtube.com/c/yichenglin88

Journeys to Mt Shasta >>> https://rss.com/podcasts/journeys-to-mt-shasta

Visual Artist >>> https://yicheng-lin.pixels.com

FB >>> https://www.facebook.com/yichenglin168

email >>> yichenglin1111@icloud.com


Updated on May 25, 2022: used “season numbers” to differentiate English & Chinese contents. See below:
S22 中文 - 雪士達山與我
S11 The mountain is calling, i must go.


Updated on April 30, 2022: i was guided to rename the show as "Journeys to Mt Shasta".


Mt Shasta is a magical place that i call “HOME” especially in the spiritual way. Ever since my first visit Mt Shasta back in October 2011, my entire life has been shifting and transforming to the levels that i could never ever imagine how my life has becoming now and continuing to evolve to be better and greater.

Starting podcasting “Mt Shasta and i” is one of my latest assignments from Mt Shasta, so the Mother Earth Heart energy could reach out to the world further and influence more people’s lives to shifting our consciousness as a whole.

If you know about Mt Shasta, you probably heard of Lemuria, Telos, High Priest Adama, Master Saint Germain and so many more… And yet, “Mt Shasta and i” is going to be based on my personal experience with Mt Shasta. To share my real life transformation examples will be the main attribute of this show. In addition to just my own storytelling, there will be soul families and friends to share their profound enlightenment experience with Mt Shasta. 

i am so excited about this new way of storytelling, instead of trying to publish “Mt Shasta and i” book 1, 2,3, which i started a few years back and somehow i did not go too far and just suddenly stopped.  Now i believe it’s time. Thank you, Mt Shasta and the Spirits. i am in gratitude!

i am also starting a Chinese / Mandarin version of "Mt Shasta and i" show. They will not be the exact same duplicates with only language difference. They will have their own uniqueness individually. 

i understand having two shows at the same time is a huge task, but i have always feel that i want to do both since the beginning. Now, i just need to start the first step and slowly build up the momentum. Constantly reminding myself not to push myself too hard. Learn to pace myself and remember to breathe.

i am a going-with-the-flow kind of guy, so it is not going to be in chronological order about my story. i will just follow the guidance from Mt Shasta and the Spirit!

Ego and fear have limited her world but leaps of faith and self love guide her to a life she never thought she could live. 

Each episode highlights reminders that were given to Evie to guide her journey and I trust they will guide you as well. Let Evie's story remind you of what you know to be true but have chosen to forget.

His goal is to help young people who have desires to serve a mission for the Church of Jesus Christ is Latter Day Saints know what they can do to be prepared for their experience as a missionary. He shares stories, gives insight, and reflects upon important gospel truths that helped him as a missionary. Now that you are in the hot seat, he hopes to pass on his baton of wisdom to you as you accept your call to serve! Feel free to email Jaron at missionpreppodcast@gmail.com
