I truly believe that the freedom & liberation we all seek is an inside job, and that we all carry within us, the unique piece of the puzzle to unlock Heaven on Earth for our Selves & for All. 

To do this, we must release the fear & conditioning that keeps us playing small and not stepping into our true authentic expression. 

And don’t get me wrong… I know that birthing a new reality is certainly not easy, but I do believe it can be simple. 

With a deep breath, let's start Here & Now.

Simin

En estos audios encontramos temas relacionados con la temática de las adicciones y es por eso que se incluyen temas, testimoniales, platicas y todo lo que tenga que ver con el área de las adicciones. 

¿Quién soy? Mi nombre es Enrique Corral y soy psicólogo maestro psicoterapeuta cognitivo-confuctual y pertenezco a una institución dedicada al tratamiento especializado en adicciones.

title: Rivista Italiana di Teosofia
description: teosofica.org * RIT on FB * La storia della Società Teosofica Italiana è stata sempre accompagnata, fin dalla fine dell’Ottocento dalla pubblicazione di Riviste a carattere teosofico (Nova Lux, Bollettino della Società Teosofica Italiana, Gnosi, Alba Spirituale e altre) contenenti ad un tempo articoli e relazioni di approfondimento sulla Teosofia e informazioni sulle attività della Società teosofia Italiana e sulla S.T. a livello internazionale, che ha come riferimento il Quartier Generale di Adyar (Chennai, India). Dal 1974 la Rivista mensile della S.T.I. ha assunto la denominazione di “Rivista Italiana di Teosofia”, venendo pubblicata ininterrottamente e giungendo quindi, a maggio 2017, al 74esimo anno di edizione. La Rivista è diretta oggi dal dott. Antonio Girardi, Segretario Generale della S.T.I.

title: Who wants to fit in anyway?
description:
Hello, My name is Bec and welcome to my podcast - Who wants to fit in anyway? This podcast was birthed from a really special place, in a moment of complete surrender and transformation. It comes from a place of pure love for all that is in this wild world we live in. 

The title for me represents a change in thinking, a change in being. Until not long ago I spent my life carrying around this feeling of never fitting in, self isolating, keeping my vulnerable side silent and afraid of completely owning who I am, rejecting myself before someone else could reject me. Mind you I didn't realise I was doing any of this in the moment. Self reflection and awareness what a beautiful thing! 

For so long I craved that feeling of being accepted, of fitting in but what I didn't realise was that it was me who needed to accept myself all along. My intention for this podcast is to help people find their sense of peace, love, sexuality, pleasure and purpose as well as wholeness and appreciation for all that is.

Everyone is welcome here. You are welcomed, love and accepted here. 

This podcast is going to be fun, random, chaotic and full of #livelaughlove energy because thats who I am. 

Connect with me on my instagram @whowantstofitinanyway

Cant wait to connect.

Later lovers,
Bec x

Akasha is the sky or ether; it represents your infinite wisdom. We have tremendous capacity for healing, growth and transformation. 
The Akasha Meditations have been created around the five Elements.
Akasha in the Element of Fire represents Love & Desire. 
Akasha in the Element of Earth represents Harmony & Balance.
Akasha in the Element of Water represents Flow & Productivity.
Akasha in the Element of Metal represents Success & Accomplishment.

The next retreat will be in Otter Crest, Oregon on Sept 21-25    Masters to Masters
https://www.eventbrite.com/e/400754887657

https://www.eventbrite.com/e/395568545167
Then we will travel to Costa Rica the day after Thanksgiving for the week.

title: Real Talk for Real Women: Let the Healing Begin
description:
Stories of Honor, Hope & Healing

The beautiful women that you will hear about in these heartfelt stories are deserving of honor. We call them Phoebes. In Romans Chapter 16, Apostle Paul describes Phoebe as a servant, friend, confidant, and helper of many. Phoebes are women who are placed in others' lives to fill those gaps that life may have caused and are motivated by love and a servant's attitude. They showed up in the lives of ordinary people at the right place and time to help them navigate the muddy waters of life. In the podcasts, you will hear stories about victory over addiction, abuse, teenage pregnancy, loss and so much more that life throws our way. The beautiful souls you will hear from are sharing from the heart -- unscripted -- about their Phoebe(s) and how they made it to the other side of their struggles. The presence and value of Phoebe may not be realized for some time, but when the pieces of their life's story are revisited, their impact is acknowledged. Honor, hope, and healing...that is what you will get. Sit back, relax, and enjoy Real Talk for Real Women: Let the Healing Begin!

title: The Inner Path of the Feminine Divine
description:
An exploration of what it means to be on your journey of Wholeness and self-transformation, to know your inner power that we call the Feminine Divine. The pathless path is the inner path of Shakti-the embodiment of Consciousness as the Goddess within and without. She is the cause of all dynamic and kinetic energy of the entire Cosmos. She creates, sustains and destroys at will when the time is ready. She is accessible to all of us at any time, with unconditional love and no qualifications needed except with a sincere approach, and commitment to receive her love, beauty and power in the many ways she expresses in reality. Join me on this journey as we cover many topics as numerous as her myriad of expressions in nature and in the cosmos. This journey will enable personal transformation should you choose it. It is your warrior's path if you should decide to wield the sword to cut through delusions, illusions and concepts of what life is about. It empowers you to choose authenticity and being centered instead of being flighty and ungrounded. It gives you the sweetness of life and all of its experiences should you choose to step into authenticity. I look forward to our coming together. 
Peace & Blessings ~ Gayathri Shylesh

title: Fixate PHX
description:
We believe in a church that is fixed on Jesus with unwavering attention and focus, that in a day in an age of distraction we fight back with devotion, that a life holistically following the ways of our Creator opens us up to be formed by Him and Him alone. A life of depth that produces fruit that remains, a life of discipline that builds everything we exist to do off of the Cornerstone, a life of sacrifice that shows the greatest love to a world so devoid of it, and a sustainable rhythm that keeps us walking with Him always.

We see a church that loves the least, last, lost, broken, and forgotten. We see a church that turns careers into callings, and conversations into moments where you sense the Holy Spirit. We see a church that seeks to see Jesus and allows the Creator to create with His most prized possession; us. 

You're invited to the journey, where we seek first the Kingdom and righteousness, and trust that He can add all things in His time.

Join Bj Murphy and guest speakers as he yarns about his life experiences and revelations as he discusses navigating two worlds and not just in his art studio but on country in a custom made pop-top trailer for all things relative to Indigenous culture such as Politics, Arts, History, Truth-Telling, Music, Country/Environment and all things past, present and future.

This is a Podcast that Bj Murphy hopes will resonate with Mob and help guide or have a positive impact on all listeners.

description:
Throughout these podcasts we will be talking about our trauma, spirituality, and our on going healing journeys. We found that through our conversations together, we have been able to help and heal each other side by side on our own personal journeys. We brought a new perspective into each other’s lives and wanted to share, in hopes to bring an insight to your own journey. 

We just want to note that these podcasts might not be for everyone and if they are too much for you-find less :)

Wise up weekly! To donate or learn more about Jubilee! Circle visit jubileecircle.com and watch us every Sunday morning at 11:15 Eastern on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/@jubileecircle.

description: This podcast focuses on educating others on what an empath is, and the different types of empaths. title: Caminando hacia el Samadhi
description:
Vivimos en un mundo en el que la prisa y el estrés forma parte de nuestra vida diaria. 
Yo hace unos años estaba en esta rueda de estrés y ansiedad sin saber cómo bajarme de ella. 
Hasta que un día un amigo me recomendó frenar y empezar a escucharme a través de la meditación ; me lo tomé en serio porque mi salud empezaba a estar muy afectada. 
Comencé con la meditación y no tarde en ver resultados en mi manera de ver la vida y de disfrutar de ella. 
Poco después comencé con el yoga y su filosofía me cautivo de tal manera que hoy mi estilo de vida ha cambiado completamente. Camino siendo consciente de los pasos que doy , te animas a caminar conmigo hacia el Samadhi?

title: Survivors of Sexual Abuse, Let's Talk
description:
During my ongoing journey of recovery I have met more and more people who have been sexually abused in one way or another. Statistics say that 1 woman out of 5 has experience some type of sexual assault and 1 out of 3 between the ages of 11 & 17. Statistics also show that 1 out of 4 men experience some type of sexual abuse in their lifetime and the same ratio as women for young men between the ages of 11 & 17. We all can find statistics in various places, and these can also be different; but you know what? We are not a number, we are human beings who know that we are part of these groups of people who are the making of the stats. We are humans, we are men and women who want to belong to something else other than statistics. We are individuals who need to not feel lonely, alone, ashamed, fearful, abandoned and forgotten. This podcast is for you, for my fellow humans who feel the deepest feelings that sexual abuse has brought to our lives. You are not alone and although I can't promise that you will feel better after listening to this podcast, I feel enormous hope that you will find in these stories some comfort in knowing that you are never alone and that better times are to come.
email: powerinsurviving@gmail.com

description:
את חשובה ואת משמעותית, ורגשות שלך חשובים ומשמעותיים. 
לפעמים אין לנו עם לחלוק את השאלות שמגיעות אלינו לראש - שאלות פילוסופיות, שאלות שמוגדרות כ "טיפשיות", שאלות אישיות... אנחנו מפחדות מביקורת, מזה שאדם אחר יגיד ששאלה שלנו זה "בולשיט", מפחדות מ "עונש" על זה ששאלנו. 
אבל כל שאלה שלך חשובה ומגיע לך למצוא תשובה לשאלה שלך. 
בפודקאסט הזה אני אעלה שאלות שלקוחות שלי שואלות אותי, שאלות שמגיעות אליי לראש, שאלות פילוסופיות ושאלות מרפאות. אנחנו ניגע בנושאים כמו: התפתחות אישית, מיניות, נשיות, יחסים עם גברים, נוודות בעולם, רוחניות, טיפול ועוד'

שמי אנסטסיה שמידט, אני מאמנת, מטפלת ומנטורית עבור נשים. 
בכל הפרוייקטים שלי אני פונה במין נקבה, אבל גם גברים יכולים למצוא פה תשובות לשאלות שלהם, כי לפני הכל אנחנו בני אדם. 

אתר שלי: https://www.shmidtanastasia.com/
אינסטגרם: https://www.instagram.com/coach_anastasia_shmidt/

Sexualidad Holística es la unión de nuestro cuerpo físico, mental, emocional,
energético y espiritual.

Con este nuevo conocimiento podrás hacer sanación y disfrutar de nuevas herramientas con una mirada de autoconsciencia y así poder evolucionar tu propia sexualidad.

Por eso te invito a que este podcast pueda guiarte en el proceso de la mejor manera en tu vida sexual y emocional, para que logres sanar y liberar tus dolores y traumas, con una mirada amorosa, respetuosa y plena.

title: Reading through the Bible (ESV)
description:
A straightforward reading through the Bible in the English Standard Version (ESV). No frills or commentary - just the Word of God. 

“For as the rain and the snow come down from heaven
    and do not return there but water the earth,
making it bring forth and sprout,
    giving seed to the sower and bread to the eater,
so shall my word be that goes out from my mouth;
    it shall not return to me empty,
but it shall accomplish that which I purpose,
    and shall succeed in the thing for which I sent it."
(Isaiah 55:10-11 ESV)

"For the word of God is living and active, sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing to the division of soul and of spirit, of joints and of marrow, and discerning the thoughts and intentions of the heart."
(Hebrews 4:12 ESV)

"All Scripture is breathed out by God and profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for training in righteousness, that the man of God may be complete, equipped for every good work."
(2 Timothy 3:16-17 ESV)

"So faith comes from hearing, and hearing through the word of Christ."
(Romans 10:17 ESV)

"The grass withers, the flower fades, but the word of our God will stand forever."
(Isaiah 40:8 ESV)

May God's Word inspire you, provoke you, convict you, encourage you, and enlighten you to better know the God of the universe who loves you! The timeless wisdom, love, and life that the Bible displays cannot be found in any other book.

title: 365 Bible Challenge
description:
***Consistently 2 days behind on the daily bible reading challenge at the mo... The gap is likely to increase as our baby is due at some point in the next 7-14 days. bare with...bare with....

Join in as we read through the whole Bible over 365 days. Each day I will share three short passages; one from the OT, one from the NT, and a small excerpt from the Psalms! Together we shall read our way through the whole bible! A little bit about me, the reader. I am a British missionary in Norway, My husband is a bush pilot and in the not-so-distant future we are hoping to go and serve together overseas. Meanwhile, daily life goes on in our little corner of Norway, as we wait for God to direct our steps. My Bible of choice to read from is an NLT but feel free to read along with whatever version or language you are most comfortable with. Let´s tuck into God´s word together!! Dip in and out and catch up as you please, but just to let you know, I have committed to posting every day for the full 365 days of 2023! I am really pumped to get going! Are you with me?

title: milyundias
description:
"Descubre Tu Magia" sale desde lo más profundo de mi corazón.

Es un podcast creado para inspirarte a vivir la vida en tu total autenticidad, crudamente siendo tú, dándote derecho de ser quien viniste a ser en esta vida, en toda tu magia. 

Me vas a conocer en mi total vulnerabilidad, y vamos a afrontar temas grandes, y temas chiquitos, juntos. Vamos a tener charlas con personas hermosas, para despertar tus ganas de descubrir tu magia. Encontrarás inspiración, herramientas, risas, apoyo, comunidad. 

Porque eres magia. Tu ser es un regalo. Tus dones son una delicia. 

Y yo, y todo el mundo, te queremos conocer. 

Estoy convencida que venimos a vivir estos sueños que gritan desde nuestro más profundo, estos sueños que callamos por miedo a vivirlos, por miedo a la grandeza que tienen, por miedo a esta version de nosotros mismos, que nos parece inalcanzable.

Y aquí estoy, para decirte que vivir esta vida, es tu derecho. 

Más: que tú se lo debes al mundo. A la vida. 

Porque te queremos ver brillar, en toda tu magia. 

Gracias por ser parte de este viaje. 
Tania

title: MINE
description:
MINE is a podcast about reclaiming YOU. 

Your time. Your life. Your perspective.

HOW MUCH OF YOUR TIME TRULY BELONGS TO YOU?

MINE is for kind-hearted people who want more control over their lives. It’s for people who tend to be overly generous with their Time, Energy and Attention and who want more Sovereignty, Power and Agency.

My name is Debbie Happy Cohen and I'm the founder of Joy-Based Living. Joy is made possible when you truly value yourself. Your beauty, your intelligence, your preciousness, your power. Have you ever seen children in a playground having fun? Young children intuitively know that they are precious and powerful. As an adult, your power is in the choices you make. And your calendar is where the rubber meets the road.
Take ownership of your life by creating a great relationship with your calendar.

MINE isn’t about adding pressure to your life, it’s about removing the obstacles to the joy that’s in you which is meant to flow freely. 

When your joy is set free, your creativity will increase, you will carry yourself with authentic authority, and you will attract truly rewarding relationships. In every area of your life.

I hope this podcast inspires you to create more joy in your life. YOU deserve it!

title: Hour of Healing
description: What do you need healing FROM, and what are you seeking healing TO. Everyone needs healing from something; physical, emotional, social, or spiritual burdens. All healing is from GOD. Each week, we will explore the right way to heal FROM wrong attitude TO the right attitude. A corrupt or bad soil cannot yield good fruit/food. This is the very bases for many disciplines advocating for more organic produce. When there is a disturbance in the bodies state of ease or comfort, don’t we end with dis-ease. Science teaches that all organ systems, including the skin function to maintain homeostasis. Imbalance leads to disorder which results in disease. The word dis-ease was first used to literally refer to lack of ease or comfort. The prefix ‘dis’ simply references the state of lack or disequilibrium. Thus, the simplest definition of healing is the process of putting at ease. Whether you are see a medical doctor, a psychiatrist, a spiritual healer or not, everyone needs healing. Subscribe, wherever you get your podcast. I can’t wait to see the lengths God takes us and what He chooses to do with these open conversations.

title: Heretics Standing at Sinai
description:
Each time Jewish thinkers pushed beyond the bounds of ideas from the past, they were labeled heretics or apostates. But the word, "heretic" comes from the Latin meaning, "to choose," and is "an opinion which disagrees with or conflicts with those who generally accept something as being authoritative, proper, or correct." In other words, a Heretic is a person who has applied their own intellect and experience of the world to emerge with a Truth that explains the Universe. This is a long-winded way of stating that, at Heretics Unite!, we explore that space which may diverge from the teachings of your childhood Sunday School teacher about the God, traditions, myths and purpose of Judaism. Join us each episode and listen with an open mind to see what feels right and what is still not quite there for you. Better yet, reach out to Rabbi Jay TelRav to join him on an upcoming episode to discuss the ideas together.

Cover art by Dr. Julie TelRav

title: The Mesnevi/Mathnawi Podcast
description:
Unlock the secrets of Rumi's timeless masterpiece, Mesnevi, with our expert host, Arzu Eylul Yalçınkaya. Each week, she brings to life the timeless teachings of the great Sufi poet Mawlana Jalaluddin Rumi through in-depth interpretations and analysis of the iconic 6-volume poem. From the first couplets to the depths of Rumi's spiritual wisdom, this podcast series is a journey like no other.

Embark on a journey of self-discovery as our host guides you through the rich themes and messages in Rumi's Mesnevi. Whether you're a seasoned reader or just discovering the world of Sufi poetry, this podcast is a must-listen for anyone who seeks a deeper understanding of spirituality and philosophy. So, sit back, relax, and let Arzu's insightful commentary take you on a journey through the timeless beauty of Rumi's Mesnevi. Join us and experience the wonder of Rumi's words, one couplet at a time.

title: Living Your Purpose
description:
Peter and his wife, Joyce share tips on health & fitness, nutrition, spiritual growth, relationships, and mental well-being. This podcast explores ways to channel your passions, natural born talents, values and beliefs into living your purpose.

Peter N. Nielsen at the early age of 15 was diagnosed with Crohn’s disease. The challenge of having Crohn’s began his lifelong journey to physical and spiritual health. Overcoming his challenges led him to winning over 50 bodybuilding awards, including: 2x Mr. International Universe and 5x Mr. America titles. Peter N. Nielsen is the creator and host of the syndicated TV and Radio show Peter’s Principles, which has impacted hundreds of thousands of lives. In 2001, after his second near death experience due to Crohn’s disease, Peter vowed to help inspire and empower as many people as he could to become a better version of themselves through his Peter’s Principles lifestyle. These Principles include improved health, importance of eating a clean diet, exercise and overall well-being. Peter now offers a worldwide platform with well over 120 million potential viewers and his shows are seen and heard in over 100 countries. He is an author of six published books, including his latest release, Soul Strength. Peter is the national spokesman for the Crohn’s and Colitis Foundation of America. He is a world-renowned fitness guru who holds an ISSA Master’s Degree Certified in Nutrition and Exercise Science. In 2016, Peter helped launch Clean Planet Foods, which delivers clean, protein packed, convenient meals with a meal plan to your doorstep. Peter has owned, and operated, health and fitness clubs as well as physical therapy clinics. He has been a personal trainer and life coach, with an elite clientele. As a life coach, he speaks all over the world as a keynote speaker. Peter was voted Trainer of the Year by Self Magazine and Muscle & Fitness.

This is TwenTea, a podcast where my friends and I dive deep into controversial topics and unpopular opinions.

Join us every week as we discuss our opinions on topics from politics and religion to pop culture and social issues. THIS ISNT FOR THE FAINT OF HEART. We take pride in not shying away from our emotions and disagreements to get to the root of understanding each other.

Our insights will probably have you thinking long after the episode is over. So whether you agree or disagree with us, we hope you will join the conversation and share your opinions.

So align your chakras, light your candles and get ready for an unfiltered candid perspective from people who aren't afraid to speak their minds.

title: Tao of Miracles
description:
Get your weekly dose of miracles and Tao every Sunday evening!

A life with miracles is not just possible - it is our birthright. Through some simple techniques to change how we interact in the world such as surrender and clearing, we can align ourselves to our most natural conscious state where miracles abound. This is how we enter the Tao, and it's not just a way to garner miracles, but to live in the flow in an open dialog with the substrate of our birth. We can't force miracles to happen, but we maximize their playing field and remain open. They will arrive!

Host Sarrah Powell has humbly claimed more miracles than the average person, and began to notice similarities in the circumstances of many of her miracles. 5 kinds of miracles would show up repeatedly. The guiding and steering miracles finally revealed how to work with our miracle nature and a floodgate opened for daily synchronicities, abundance, healing, and perfect manifestations..

Combining a 30 year spiritual practice with the same amount of time on a miracle journey, while putting most of her miracles through the scientific process, Sarrah shares how everyone can align to their miracle nature.

The results have been astounding - our miracles tangibly demonstrate that Universe, God, Divine Spirit- whatever your believe - is powerful, precise, timely and always working in our favor, as it steers us to our highest good and just possibly, our soul purpose.. Check out more at www.sarrahpowell.com .

Original music written and performed by Ray McGeehan specifically for Tao of Miracles. Copyright not transferrable.

title: Reigning In Light™
description:
Reigning In Light is the beginning of a journey. A journey of enlightenment, healing and hope. Mindfulness, meditation, breathing, calming, grounding techniques and motivation are all utilized. The foundation of Reigning In Light is peace. The core of it, is acceptance. And the intention of it, is to welcome the spirit to guide us. Reigning In Light looks at members of the human species as both a unique individual and a being with similar desires and characteristics to others with a need to not only contribute to the whole but gain from it as well. Reigning In Light is meant to be food for the soul and is filled with metaphors and analogies. It is a unification tactic with the universe. It is a remembrance of our inner connectivity to the earth and beyond. Reigning In light supports the straightening of our crown and the walking with our heads held high. It is not a replacement for therapy. The podcast begins with an introductory pilot that is more meditative than the subsequent episodes, which are topic based and an idea of spiritual health. It is a partner in solitude, a moment of gratitude and a challenger of isolation.

At this time, listeners can expect new episodes once per week.

www.reigninginlight.org

title: The Soul Growth Podcast
description:
Who is this for: This podcast is for anyone who loves self-development, spirituality, psychic and paranormal phenomenon, psychology and life-purpose. Ultimately, if you who want to break free from the grind of life, find your power, and start living a life of synchronistic adventure, this is for you!

The format of this podcast will be a mix of personal experiences, thought provoking concepts and interviews with like-minded souls.

Who is Adam Leonard: I am man in his early 40's and I have always had a burning curiosity about the meaning of life and human potential. My life path has taken many turns, but my innate spiritual being led to develop my natural psychic talents. Consequently, I have worked as a Psychic Medium professionally for over 20 years, performing on Live TV and in a variety of events. However, I was always more interested in helping people overcome their problems and grow, so I decided to qualify as a Counsellor Hypnotherapist and have been bringing these skills into my work for over 10 years. Eventually, I wanted to make more of an impact, so I became a Qualified Teacher and upgraded my knowledge with a Masters in Psychology. However, Teaching became more about satisfying the Curriculum's agenda than helping children grow.

My mission: Over the last few years I have decided to reach a larger audience and branched out online. I have developed a Soul Growth Coaching business that specialises in helping people live authentic spiritually fulfilling lives, full of growth and synchronistic adventure, and that is my intention with this podcast.

title: Who's in the pew?
description:
Hello and welcome to “Who’s in the Pew!” I’m Melissa Pici, Editor of La Fe Magazine. This show is an extension of La Fe, and a production of We Hope, which is run by the Diocese of Laredo’s Communication Department.

Each week, we will get to know someone new, and learn a little bit about his or her unique involvement in our diocese. Join us here to meet “your neighbor,” the young adult seeking God’s guidance in his life, the woman who spends much of her free time volunteering to serve at her parish, the man who returned to his faith after years of rejecting God, the young woman who teaches teens about the merciful love of Christ, the widow who was carried by God when waking up to face another day seemed too difficult, and some of our clergy who have answered a special call to follow and serve our Lord.

We hope you will enjoy meeting others who “sit in the pews” of parishes right here in the Diocese of Laredo.

Hosted by experienced meditation teachers and musicians, our podcast guides you through various meditation techniques, including mindfulness, breath awareness, and visualization. With each session, you'll feel more grounded, centered, and at peace as you connect with your inner self and tap into a deep sense of well-being.

Our podcast is perfect for anyone who wants to enhance their meditation practice or unwind and recharge after a long day. Whether you're new to meditation or a seasoned practitioner, our sessions are a powerful tool for self-care and personal growth.

So join us for "Musical Meditation" and experience the transformative power of music and meditation for yourself.

title: Tafsir of Surah Al-Kahf by Sheikh Mohammad Akram Nadwi
description:
"Whoever preserves the first ten verses of Surah Al-Kahf will be protected from the Dajjal" Prophet Mohammad (SAW)

This surah was revealed in Makkah at a time when the hostility of the Quraysh, and their fear and hatred of Islam and of the Prophet, were at their height. They adopted every measure to stop the Prophet from preaching and the people from listening to him; soon they would plot to kill him: there are hints in the surah that the command to emigrate to Madinah is imminent.

Listen in as Sheikh Akram Nadwi delves into the key concepts and themes present in the stories of Musa (AS) and Khidr, Dhul Qarnain, the Companions of the Cave, the Owner of the Two Gardens, and the Last Day. Each of these stories holds significant lessons and messages that are still applicable to our lives today.

description:

We tend to think of rituals as something outside ourselves, generally officiated by religious/official bodies, the marriage ceremony, the bar mitzvah, graduation. And then there are private rituals we perform in times of transformation. I participated in the Sweat Lodge ritual seeking wisdom in counseling those who come to me for assistance on their life journey.

title: Spirit Walking with Jesus
description:
Jesus Christ said that “God is a spirit, and those who worship Him must worship Him in spirit and in truth” as stated by Him in John 4:24.

Jesus also said, “...the words that I speak unto you, they are spirit, and they are life” in John 6:63.

Therefore, it is the purpose of these podcast episodes to allow the words of Jesus Christ and others contained within the Bible to reveal what is meant in these and other ‘mysterious’ sayings in the Bible.

This teaching is especially aimed at those in the Christian community who need to appreciate that unless they become “spiritually minded” as commanded by the Apostle Paul, they will be deemed to be “carnally (or ‘religiously’) minded”—which will make them an enemy of both God and Christ:

“For to be CARNALLY MINDED is [eternal] DEATH; but to be SPIRITUALLY MINDED is LIFE and PEACE [with God]. 7 Because THE CARNAL MIND IS ENMITY [or an enemy] AGAINST GOD: for it is not subject to the law of God, neither indeed can be.” (Romans 8:6-7)

These podcasts will speak on spiritual topics such as:

  • What the New Birth represents (John 3:3-8)

  • God sees Christians as spiritual trees—either fruitful or fruitless (Mark 8:23-25; John 15:1-8)

  • The ‘Gifts of the Spirit (1 Cor 12:8-11) and how God requires every Christian to obtain and use them in their service as “...good and faithful servants” (Matthew 25:21)

  • The location and function of our soul, our spirit and the internal spiritual organs of our heart, mind and how evil spirits can influence their function.

  • ...and more besides!

My first podcast episode explains my spiritual journeyover the past 30-years and how God has allowed Satan’s people to afflict me in much the same way as God allowed Satan to afflict Job.

Join me in exploring what the words of Jesus Christ and (primarily) the words of His apostles say in the King James Bible so that we can each grow into a strong level of spiritual maturity so as to overcome the wicked one (1 John 2:13-14)!

Hey there, podcast enthusiasts and seekers of transformation! I'm your host, Mary Armendarez, and I'm beyond thrilled to welcome you to the most empowering podcast on the airwaves. From overcoming personal setbacks to triumphing over obstacles, each episode will leave you equipped with practical tools to reclaim your power and transform your life.

Are you ready to rewrite your story, rediscover your potential, and reignite your inner fire? The Power Retrieval Podcast is your go-to resource for actionable insights, inspiring anecdotes, and a supportive community that believes in your ability to rise above.

Join us on this thrilling journey of self-empowerment. Subscribe now and get ready to unlock a world of limitless possibilities. Remember, your power is waiting to be retrieved – let's embark on this transformative adventure together!

description:
On this podcast I'll be sharing topics mostly related to personal development based on the 'law of attraction'. I want to help people who aren't fully satisfied with their lives and who want more from life.

If you experience lack in your life, whether financial, emotional, in relationships, or just struggling with emotional stuff that's affecting your life, then this podcast could potentially help you out. I've managed to overcome some pretty tough situations & experiences, and it's purely been possible because of all the content I've consumed over the years, and that's what I'd like to give back, practical ways of improving your experiences and overcoming obstacles holding you back.

Any form of personal experience takes time and on this podcast I'm not going to give you methods to manifest your desires in 3 days etc., but rather to give you guidance and mental strength to pursue what you want, preparing you personally to match the vibration of what you want in the long run. Remember, change is hard...

If you want to reach out to me, you can email me at ruvey.roets@gmail.com

All the best

Ruvey

title: TapestryTalk
description:
Tapestry is an online space where spiritually curious people can grow and thrive. We weave together the threads of our struggles, doubts, faith, joys, and hopes to create content designed to get conversations going. We also provide safe space for those conversations to happen. We believe that when we are heard and valued, we can begin to believe we are loved. Learn more at TapestryTalk.org

our values:

Questions are encouraged. We expect that every question will have many true answers. No question or question-asker will be disrespected or shamed.

We are honest and real. Our own questions, doubts, disagreements, curiosity, and excitement will be on display. We refuse to hide who we are, both as individuals and as a team. We say what we mean, and we mean what we say.

Different is good. We grow and learn when we engage with people who have ideas, values, and experiences that are not the same as our own. Honoring our differences makes us stronger.

Accessible and inclusive language is vital. We do our best to use clear language free of jargon and insider code. We intentionally use language that includes rather than excludes, and is welcoming to people of all ages and walks of life.

Curiosity is expected. The opposite of faith isn’t doubt, it’s certainty. Ever-deepening spirituality is only possible with insatiable curiosity.

title: The Moccasin Telegraph
description:
WELCOME, MY RELATIVES, TO THE MOCCASIN TELEGRAPH!

The Moccasin Telegraph was created to help teach our truths and values that we practice through our land-based culture and to bring in the knowledge keepers who will educate on our culture and the history of the Ocheti Sakowin. The Ocheti Sakowin is the Seven Council Fires, which is made up of the Dakhota, Lakhota and Nakhota Oyates.

The Moccasin Telegraph is about truth telling. If I, or any one on the podcast miseducates, please let us know. We want the information going out to be based in truth. Following the ways of our ancestors in speaking with respect and honor.

Education of the history of our land-based cultures past, present, and future is essential to re-Indigenizing the Ocheti Sakowin Oyate and The Moccasin Telegraph will be part of that education. Along with that education, The Moccasin Telegraph podcast will delve into topics that address food sovereignty, watersheds, microbes, ecosystems, historical trauma, mental health education, housing, education, oral and written language, equine therapy, treaties, land base/back, being a citizen of the Ocheti Sakowin, homelessness, the Ocheti Sakowin governance system, child development and parenting, to name a few. The idea is to share The Moccasin Telegraph podcast on the internet, radio stations, classrooms, with families and one another. We will involve relatives who will share their knowledge, stories and skills. The Moccasin Telegraph may eventually bring in video stories and video podcasts but will begin with it in audio form. We have an incredible culture to teach and bring forth to help in bringing back health to all our relatives.

Our culture has thrived and endured hardships for tens of thousands of years and I give thanks and appreciation to those relatives before me. I am proud to say I am Lakota and Nakota! Let us come together with good hearts and open minds to heal. Pilamaye lo!

With expert insights and personal anecdotes, each episode offers practical tips and inspiration for navigating life's challenges and promoting well-being. So grab a cup of tea, settle in, and join our community of Peanuts as we explore the nuts and bolts of mental health.

So you will find your medicine and it will resonate with you at any time) and share channeled Sound Healing Meditations to support us in shedding what no longer serves us and aligns with our passion and purpose and bringing in higher frequencies allowing us to shift, transform and manifest with greater ease.

Your Host -

Ahava

title: Mbongi dia Katiopa
description:
“La culture d’un peuple est l'expression de l'âme de ce peuple dont sa langue est le véhicule principal.”

Ce podcast diffuse des émissions destinées aux enfants de mama Katiopa (Afrique ) du continent et de la diaspora en vue d'impacter positivement autour d'eux et de contribuer au changements nécessaires à l'élévation de l'Afrique et à sa participation au concert des nations …

Je suis Yaya NZONZA ,muana nkongo ,mukongo ( originaire du Kongo ) et présentatrice principale de ces émissions. Je vais donc m'appesantir sur le KONGO et partager avec vous des émissions sur les 4 sujets suivants :

  • Bukongo - Sagesse Kongo

    👉 Partage et diffusion des enseignements spirituels du Bukongo - la sagesse Kongo

  • Héros Kongo - Bakulu ba nunga

    👉 Vérités et valorisation de nos héros qui ont combattus physiquement et spirituellement pour la restauration du Kongo dia Ntotila

  • Mbongi dia Katiopa

    👉 Instants motivations des fils et filles de Katiopa (Afrique ) pour impacter positivement autour d'eux et de contribuer au changement nécessaire à l'élévation de l'Afrique et à sa participation au concert des nations ...

  • Contes initiatiques Kongo - Lusansu lua Kongo

    👉 Lecture et réflexions autour de la profondeur spirituelle des contes Kongo

Biesse bia Katiopa ( Les délices d'Afrique ) est une autoentreprise dirigée par Mérolie MBEYA qui diffuse ces contenus.

Pour en savoir plus sur les prestations de cette entreprise, veuillez visiter mon site 👇

www.bbkatioapa.com

Vous pouvez visiter la boutique BbK pour acheter les produits et encens traditionnels Kongo ainsi que les ebooks et podcast des enseignements spirituels Kongo 👇

https://www.bbkatiopa.com/category/all-products

title: Scooby, What's New, Queer & Delicious?
description: This is a gothic-esque folklore, myths, traditions, and legends podcast with one hell of a true story. Lou explores their identity, family identity, and community and sociocultural contexts of their own life while researching the tales of old and retellings over time. Learning and believing in what’s not “normal” is going back to tradition and origin, visiting different places and people, understanding fear, and inviting in unexpected openness to new ideas. Scooby and the gang taught us how, but we’ve forgotten that the mystery is never solved, only exposed piece by piece until we’ve gotten enough clues to bring down the man, system, and evils that are, in fact, real and placating our world. Follow Lou as they gather their facts, listen to their intuition, and explore mystery. It’s time for a new Mystery Inc. and Lou is here to bring down the haunted mansion and unveil the bad guys in style.

title: Vamos PhiloSofá??

Vem com a gente?

title: Apana Podcast
description:
The word Apana is borrowed from the Sanskrit language & is used as your reminder to EXHALE.

It not only brings you back to your breath - but reminds you let go, to release, to de-stress. To calm down.

In stressful situations we all have the tendency to hold our breath. This causes the body to tense up.

I created Apana podcast to help people learn different ways that they can ground themselves in stressful situations & bring awareness back into their current experience.

Each episode holds a theme or concept I have learned through personal experience as a yoga teacher, personal trainer & as a human being living life.

Follow Apana Podcast on twitter & instagram for updates @apanapodcast

& If you enjoy listening to this podcast you can support my work by making a donation via : buymeacoffee.com/kaitfrost Namaste.

Dear listeners,

Do you want to deepen your faith and explore the teachings of Christianity in a new and insightful way? Then, tune in to our Christian podcast!

Our show is designed to bring inspiration, knowledge and understanding of the Bible and its teachings. Each episode features a variety of topics, inspired by the HOLY SPIRIT. We share our unique perspectives and experiences to help you grow closer to God and develop a faith that is relevant, practical, and fulfilling.

We also put a big emphasis on the necessity to be a praying believer and the rewards and transformation power of a robust prayer life.

Whether you're a lifelong believer, a new convert, or simply someone seeking answers to life's big questions, our podcast has something for everyone. So why not join us on this journey of discovery and let's explore the wonders and mysteries of Christianity together.

Thank you for listening!

title: Osho Discourse in Hindi
description:
Osho Rajneesh, also known as Bhagwan Shree Rajneesh and later as Osho, was a controversial and charismatic spiritual teacher, mystic, and philosopher. Born on December 11, 1931, in Kuchwada, a small village in central India, Osho gained international prominence in the 1970s and 1980s for his unconventional teachings, vibrant personality, and unique approach to spirituality. Throughout his life, Osho challenged traditional religious and societal norms, advocating for personal freedom, self-expression, and the exploration of human consciousness.

Osho's discourses and lectures, often delivered in a humorous and irreverent manner, were recorded and transcribed into over 600 books, covering a wide range of topics. These books continue to be published and read by millions of people worldwide. Osho's teachings have influenced a diverse range of individuals, including spiritual seekers, intellectuals, artists, and therapists.

title: O que é o Espiritismo
description:
A Obra O que é o espiritismo, de Allan Kardec, é uma Introdução ao conhecimento do mundo invisível, pelas manifestações dos espíritos, contendo o resumo dos princípios da Doutrina Espírita e respostas às principais objeções que podem ser apresentadas.

Sob a forma de diálogos, o primeiro capítulo responde às observações mais comuns feitas por aqueles que desconhecem os princípios fundamentais da Doutrina. No segundo capítulo, há uma exposição simples das partes da ciência prática e experimental, sobre as quais, na falta de uma instrução teórica completa, o observador novato deve fixar a sua atenção para poder julgar com conhecimento de causa; é, aproximadamente, um resumo de O livro dos médiuns. No terceiro capítulo, publicamos um resumo de O livro dos espíritos, com a solução, pela Doutrina Espírita, de certo número de problemas do mais alto interesse, de ordem psicológica, moral e filosófica, que diariamente são propostos. Estes resumos não somente são úteis aos principiantes, que neles poderão, em pouco tempo, ter o conhecimento das noções mais essenciais da Doutrina Espírita, senão, também, aos adeptos, pois lhes fornecem os meios para responderem às primeiras objeções que não deixarão de lhes apresentar.

Produção: EM Lives TV.

Realização: Projeto Espiritismo e Mediunidade.

title: O Livro dos Médiuns
description:
O Livro dos Médiuns de Allan Kardec é uma obra essencial no estudo e na prática da mediunidade. Dividido em duas partes, Kardec explora de forma sistemática e abrangente diversos aspectos relacionados à mediunidade, fornecendo orientações, esclarecimentos e exemplos práticos. Ele aborda temas como a natureza dos espíritos, os tipos de mediunidade, o desenvolvimento mediúnico, a comunicação com os espíritos, a obsessão, as evocações e os médiuns curadores, entre outros. O livro apresenta uma abordagem científica e racional, embasada em observações e experimentações, visando orientar tanto médiuns quanto estudiosos interessados na compreensão e no exercício responsável da mediunidade. Com linguagem clara e didática, Kardec busca desmistificar conceitos, fornecer diretrizes éticas e oferecer recursos práticos para o trabalho mediúnico sério e consciente.

title: Tramas do Destino
description:
Este podcast tem por objetivo o estudo do livro de Manoel Philomeno de Miranda (Espírito), psicografado por Divaldo Franco que aborda de forma profunda e sensível as questões relacionadas ao destino humano. Temos aqui a história do Espírito Ártemis, que abre mão de sua condição feliz no mundo espiritual para ajudar antigos afetos, numa reencarnação difícil, não por débito, mas por amor. Mostra a vida de renúncia deste Espírito, numa pequena cidade do interior da Bahia, frente às obsessões perniciosas, enfermidades como a hanseníase e dores morais superlativas, a fim de promover a redenção do seu clã. Atesta os benefícios dos ensinamentos espíritas, tendo na reencarnação a chave, a explicação dos sofrimentos humanos. Objetiva alertar e consolar aos que, na trama dos destinos, se veem atados nas redes dos compromissos procedentes das vidas passadas. Ressalta-se a vitória do amor vencendo o túmulo, já que a morte não existe, refletindo a verdade do Amor, Justiça e Misericórdia divina.

title: Seeking Mount Parnassus
description:
Astrologically-inspired conversations about philosophy, love, and how to be a wide-awake human in a dark age.

This podcast has no labels and no limits – we bring into it all of who we are and share our writings and conversations out of the simple motivation to express ourselves freely, and to come to our own understandings of all of the things that give meaning to our lives.

Our interests range from astrology, buddhism, and energy work to anarchism, skateboarding, horses, and poetry. We are writers, explorers, questioners, and instigators; we are also deep thinkers and deep feelers. Having grown tired of shallow, stupid, unoriginal conversations, we decided to open the door to our own inner world, and send out a beacon to any others trying to keep their flame alive in the darkness.

We invite you to join us on the path to Mount Parnassus. If we can meet there and bring our small flames together, we can blow on them and tend them together until they grow into a magnificent blaze.

www.seekingmountparnassus.com

title: Soul Speak with Meg Michaelson
description:
I am Meg Michaelson. Founder of SoulSpeak Integrative Healing and Well House 1900. Almost 30 years ago, I awoke to a realization that changed my life.

We are humans, in a very messy world, and too often we forget the incredibleness that our soul is urging us to remember. Our soul that is always trying to communicate with us to live in the beautiful ways we came here to live. To push us to be awake, even when and especially when, we are too tired to do so.

I have a mission in this lifetime, to help people live in the truth, to help us live in the balance. To help us live knowing we can find love every day, learning to live in the balance of our inner feminine and masculine. I have a mission to help others take more risks, and step away from the fear and into the unknown. Not alone, but with the connection of our souls.

During our weekly time together, we will share stories of moments from all aspects of our lives, and we will meet other humans trying to live a life awake too. We will learn how to connect our earth life to the language of our soul life, and invite this connection into every earthly experience.

title: Tarot De Sass
description: In this podcast, we explore one of the most image-rich divination tools; Tarot. Learning Tarot has given us insight into our own inner workings and has become an invaluable self-analysis tool that we wish to share with the world. Join us as we learn more about our own natures.

title: Awakening to the Present
description:
In this episode, we'll unpack what mindfulness really is - exploring its rich origins and how it has become a modern tool for combating stress and enhancing mental wellness.

One of the core aspects of mindfulness is embracing the present moment. We’ll dive into the significance of ‘now’ and discover how staying present can lead to improved focus and reduced anxiety.

Meet the visionary Jay Patel, whose personal experiences have culminated in his enlightening eBook, “The Art of Now.” We’ll get a glimpse into the vision behind this resourceful book.

One of the highlights of this episode is a guided breathing exercise. A simple yet powerful mindfulness exercise, this segment is designed to help listeners connect with the present moment.

Jay Patel isn’t just about theories; he practices what he preaches. We’ll provide an overview of Jay’s coaching services in fitness and mindfulness and direct you to where you can find more information.

Our community is the backbone of this podcast. We encourage you to actively share your thoughts and experiences. Connect with us on social media or via email to become an integral part of this journey.

Before we wrap up, we’ll give you a sneak peek into what future episodes hold. Expect to unravel meditation techniques and delve into the science behind mindfulness.

As we conclude, a big thank you for tuning in. Don’t forget to subscribe and leave a review. Join us next time for deeper insights into the art of mindfulness. Now, relax and let the soothing closing music wash over you.

Find us online:

  • Website: www.fortitude.cloud

title: El Mundo De Concha
description:
Queridas oyentes, Aquí encontrarán un canal totalmente diferente a todos esos audios de autoayuda y frases mantras con los que estamos hartas. Porque vamos a ser sinceras, a veces necesitamos algo más que palabras motivadoras vacías, ¿verdad? por que nuestros "santos ovarios" nos hacen ser fuertes y poderosas. Nos olvidaremos de los tecnicismos y los largos discursos que nos harían caer en los brazos de Morfeo.

En este espacio, vamos a abordar el jaleo emocional que todas tenemos a diario. Sí, ese enredo de sentimientos, pensamientos y situaciones que nos hacen sentir como si estuviéramos en un constante torbellino.

Hablaremos de forma clara, directa y sin tapujos. Porque creemos firmemente que es mejor entendernos de igual a igual, como amigas que comparten sus vivencias y se apoyan mutuamente.

No encontrarán palabras vacías o simples consuelos momentáneos. En cambio, nos adentraremos en los laberintos emocionales y buscaremos soluciones reales, prácticas y adaptadas a nuestra vida cotidiana. ¿Acaso no es eso lo que realmente necesitamos?

Así que, queridas oyentes, prepárense para sumergirse en un mundo donde las verdades se dicen sin filtros y las risas se mezclan con los consejos. Aquí encontraremos un refugio donde seremos auténticas, sin miedo a expresar nuestras frustraciones, nuestros deseos y nuestras metas.

En "El mundo de Concha", seremos valientes y nos apoyaremos unas a otras. Juntas exploraremos la fuerza interior que todas llevamos dentro, ese poder que nos impulsa a superar obstáculos y a crecer como personas.

Así que agarren sus auriculares, relájense y déjense llevar por esta nueva forma de afrontar los desafíos emocionales. Estoy emocionada de compartir este camino con ustedes y de construir una comunidad de mujeres fuertes, auténticas y dispuestas a enfrentar cualquier desafío que la vida nos ponga en el camino.

¡Bienvenidas al mundo de Concha, donde juntas encontraremos el poder que hay en nosotras!

title: Soul Pod
description:
Welcome to SoulPod, the podcast that delves deep into the realms of spirituality, offering thought-provoking conversations and insights to nourish your mind, heart, and soul. Join us as we embark on a transformative journey, exploring diverse spiritual traditions, ancient wisdom, and modern insights, bridging the gap between the Persian and English-speaking communities.

In each episode, I will guide you through meaningful discussions on topics ranging from mindfulness, self-discovery, and personal growth to meditation, energy healing, and the interconnectedness of all beings. Through engaging interviews with spiritual leaders, healers, and everyday seekers, SoulPod invites you to embark on a quest for inner wisdom and enlightenment.

Uncover the hidden gems of spiritual practices, unravel profound teachings, and gain practical tools to navigate life's challenges with grace and purpose. Whether you're a seasoned spiritual seeker or new to the path, our podcast creates a sacred space where profound insights, inspiring stories, and transformative experiences converge.

Tune in to SoulPod and let the power of spirituality ignite your soul, bringing you closer to a life of authenticity, connection, and profound spiritual awakening. Join our community, share in the wisdom, and embark on an extraordinary journey of self-discovery and spiritual growth.

--------------

به SoulPod، پادکستی که به اعماق روحانیت فرو می‌روید، خوش آمدید. اینجا مکانی است برای بحث‌های الهام‌بخش و بینش‌های تحول‌بخش که ذهن، قلب و روح شما را تغذیه می‌کند. همراه با ما بر روی سفری تحولی قرار بگیرید و در تلاش برای کشف سنت‌های روحانی متنوع، حکمت‌های باستانی و بینش‌های مدرن، پلی را بین جامعه فارسی‌زبانان و انگلیسی‌زبانان بسازیم.

در هر قسمت، در بحث‌های مفیدی همراهی می شوید که در آنها به موضوعاتی از جمله آگاهی ذهنی، کشف خود و رشد شخصی، مدیتیشن، شفای انرژی و ارتباط بین همه موجودات می‌پردازیم. از طریق مصاحبه‌های جذاب با رهبران روحانی، درمانگران و جستجوگران روزمره، سوال‌روان شما را به سفری در جستجوی حکمت و روشنگری درونی دعوت می‌کند.

گنجینه‌های پنهانی روش‌های روحانی را کشف کنید، تعالیم عمیق را بازکنید و ابزارهای عملی را برای مقابله با چالش‌های زندگی با آرامش و هدف‌مندی به دست آورید. بگوش دادن به SoulPod، به قدرت روحانیت درونیتان نور می‌بخشد و شما را به سمت زندگی با صداقت، ارتباط و بیداری روحانی عمیق‌تر می‌برد. به جامعه ما بپیوندید، به حکمت‌ها سهمی بدهید و در سفری بی‌نظیر از کشف خود و رشد روحانی، به سرعت پیش بروید.

title: 鬼谷易學
description:
大家好，我是火鳳鼎哥~白羽。 火是生命起源，更是文明的開始。 火能鍛金銅成器，璀璨耀眼，帶動文明。 早在新石器時代，中國先民就開始使用陶鼎，到了金石時代，青銅鼎出現，在夏商兩代的發展，達到巔峰。 西周青銅鼎紋飾簡約，代表國家社稷的禮器。戰國時期禮樂崩壞，七雄爭霸，於是，奇人異士群起，火鳳鼎歌就此展開......

title: Numerohología Integrativa
description:
Bienvenidos a Numerohología Integrativa, el podcast donde descubrimos el fascinante poder de los números en nuestra vida. Soy Sergio Eyzhan Del Castillo, y cada semana exploraremos las profundidades de la numerología para revelar los secretos y significados ocultos detrás de cada número.

Desde la antigüedad, los números han sido considerados como una ventana hacia nuestro ser interior y un lenguaje universal que conecta todos los aspectos de nuestra existencia. A través de este podcast, desentrañaremos los enigmas numéricos, exploraremos cómo los números influyen en nuestras decisiones y descubriremos cómo podemos utilizar su sabiduría para crear armonía en nuestras vidas.

Te invito a unirte a mí en este viaje de descubrimiento mientras exploramos las vibraciones numéricas, revelamos secretos ancestrales y desvelamos los mensajes ocultos en cada dígito. Juntos, aprenderemos a interpretar las energías numéricas que nos rodean y a utilizarlas como una herramienta para alcanzar nuestro máximo potencial.

Así que, si estás listo para sumergirte en el apasionante mundo de la numerología y desbloquear los misterios de los números, acompáñame en Numerohología Integrativa.

¡Prepárate para desatar el poder que llevas dentro con tus números y descubrir una nueva forma de vivir en plenitud y equilibrio!

title: No Rumo do Mundo de Regeneração
description:
"No Rumo do Mundo de Regeneração" é um livro psicografado por Divaldo Franco, atribuído a Manoel Philomeno de Miranda. Ele apresenta uma visão otimista sobre a evolução espiritual da Terra, rumo a um mundo regenerado. O autor aborda questões como egoísmo, ganância e violência, enfatizando a importância da reforma íntima e do cultivo de virtudes como amor, solidariedade e paz. Ele oferece orientações práticas para contribuir com essa transformação, destacando a importância da educação, família, trabalho, autoconhecimento e espiritualidade. Além disso, explora a visão espírita sobre a vida após a morte e a lei de causa e efeito. O livro transmite uma mensagem de esperança, incentivando o engajamento na construção de um mundo melhor através da transformação interior e do serviço ao próximo.

Produção: EM Lives TV.

Realização: Projeto Espiritismo e Mediunidade.
author_name: EM Lives TV - Espiritismo e Mediunidade

title: Let’s Talk Healing
description: I will be talking about topics that should intentionally touch the hearts of those who need to feel whole again. I will be transparent and share my own experiences to reassure you that you are not alone in whatever you are feeling and going through. I pray that you find peace in healing.

title: Nas Fronteiras da Loucura
description:
Este podcast tem como objetivo o estudo do livro "Nas Fronteiras da Loucura", de autoria de Manoel Philomeno de Miranda, psicografado por Divaldo Franco. O livro trata da temática da loucura sob a perspectiva espírita, oferecendo esclarecimentos sobre as causas espirituais e os tratamentos relacionados aos distúrbios mentais. Ao lado de Bezerra de Menezes, o autor espiritual narra suas observações durante o período de um carnaval carioca. Aborda as várias técnicas obsessivas em casos de abusos e alienações com droga, álcool, sexo, aborto e tentativa de suicídio. Demonstra o trabalho dos Bons Espíritos num Posto de Socorro Central no mundo espiritual. São apresentados casos reais de pacientes com distúrbios mentais, ressaltando a importância da terapia espiritual, da mediunidade terapêutica e do apoio fraterno em seu processo de recuperação. O livro também enfatiza a responsabilidade social em relação aos doentes mentais, buscando promover a compreensão, acolhimento e cuidado por parte da sociedade.

Produção: EM Lives TV.

Realização: Projeto Espiritismo e Mediunidade.

title: Chasing Thoughts
description:
Step into a realm of intellectual exploration and contemplation with "Chasing Thoughts," an enthralling podcast that delves into the depths of the human experience to unearth profound truths and wisdom.

Hosted by an inquisitive and open-minded duo, this thought-provoking podcast embarks on a mesmerizing journey to investigate the multifaceted aspects of life, offering listeners a unique opportunity to engage in deep, curious dialogues.

Through insightful conversations, riveting interviews, and captivating storytelling, each episode examines the human experience from various angles, aiming to unlock the mysteries that lie beneath the surface."Chasing Thoughts" delves into a vast array of topics, transcending boundaries and shedding light on what it truly means to be human. From exploring the complexities of emotions and relationships to delving into the realms of spirituality, science, philosophy, and beyond, this podcast navigates the vast tapestry of life with an unwavering commitment to discovering deeper truths.

HOW IT STARTED

​In the vast realm of social media, incredible connections can emerge from unexpected places. Meet Mindy and Keith, two life coaches who serendipitously crossed paths on TikTok, forming a unique bond that has led them to embark on an inspiring venture together. As strangers turned co-producers, they are now the driving force behind the thought-provoking podcast called "Chasing Thoughts." With their shared passion for exploring the depths of the human experience, Mindy and Keith are on a mission to empower listeners to embrace introspection and transform their lives.

Mindy and Keith’'s journey began with seemingly random TikTok videos that resonated deeply with both of them. Drawn to each other's thought-provoking content and shared philosophies, they decided to connect, discovering an immediate connection rooted in their mutual curiosity about the complexities of life. This virtual meeting sparked a shared vision to create something impactful together. Fuelled by their desire to delve into the depths of the human experience and help others along the way, Mindy and Keith joined forces to co-produce a podcast called "Chasing Thoughts."

ABOUT YOUR HOSTS

Keith Dauch is a Strategic Interventionist, Stoner-Spirited Life Coach, and the Owner of BreakPoint Coaching. BreakPoint operates off the belief that, regardless of our situation, the power to change and overcome already resides in each and every one of us.https://breakpointcoaching.org/

Mindy Aisling is an Authenticity Empowerment Coach, offering 1:1 coaching, DIY Courses, and Live Online Workshops designed to teach you how to develop a strong sense of SELF and use that powerful foundation to create a meaningful life. https://www.mindyaisling.com/

title: TOTOCAST (TOtal TOtke podCAST)
description: Totocast is a captivating and informative Podcast channel dedicated to exploring the world of Vedic Totke, which are traditional rituals and remedies popular in various cultures. Hosted by experts in the field, this podcast offers a unique blend of ancient wisdom, modern insights, and practical advice for listeners seeking spiritual guidance or solutions to life's challenges. Each episode of Totocast delves into a specific aspect of Vedic totke, covering a wide range of topics such as astrology, Vastu Shastra, Feng Shui, crystal healing, energy cleansing, and more. The knowledgeable hosts share their expertise and experiences, providing in-depth explanations, step-by-step instructions, and tips on how to perform these rituals effectively. Whether you are interested in enhancing your well-being, attracting positive energy, manifesting your desires, or seeking remedies for specific problems, Totocast offers a treasure trove of information and techniques to explore. The episodes are designed to be accessible to both beginners and seasoned practitioners, making it easy for anyone to engage with the fascinating world of Vedic Totke. Totocast aims to empower its audience by demystifying ancient practices, debunking myths, and offering practical applications that can be incorporated into daily life. The podcast serves as a trusted companion, guiding listeners on their spiritual journey, and helping them tap into the power of these age-old practices to create positive transformations. Join Totocast and unlock the secrets of Vedic Totke as you embark on a path of self-discovery, spiritual growth, and holistic well-being. Our Podcast is available in all major platforms or any other platforms where you listen to podcast. ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- टोटोकास्ट टोटोकास्ट एक ऐसा पॉडकास्ट चैनल है, जहां पर ज्ञानवर्धक, आध्यात्मिक, वैदिक टोटकों, अनुष्ठानों से संबन्धित दिलचस्प और मानव कल्याणकारी जानकारियां मिलती हैं । इसमें वास्तु शास्त्र, ज्योतिष शास्त्र, फेंगसुई, क्रिस्टल हीलिंग, आयुर्वेद, दूसरे स्वास्थ्य और समृद्धि से संबन्धित विषयों पर इन क्षेत्रों के विशेषज्ञों की चर्चा होती है । वे हर विषय को अपने अपने नज़रिये से विश्लेषण करते हैं । फिर हमारे प्राचीन ज्ञान को वर्तमान के विज्ञान की रोशनी में बड़े सरल ढंग से समझाते हैं । ताकि आम आदमी उन्हे अपने जीवन में आसानी से शामिल कर सके और उसको आध्यात्मिक, शारीरिक और आर्थिक लाभ मिले । हमारे विशेषज्ञ उनको मिथकों के भंवर में फंसने से भी बचाते हैं । सीधे शब्दों में कहें तो टोटोकास्ट एक आम आदमी का सच्चा साथी, मार्गदर्शक और मानव कल्याण करने वाला डिजिटल प्लेटफार्म है । हमारा यह पॉडकास्ट सभी बड़े प्लेटफार्म पर उपलब्ध है । इसलिए इसे आप किसी भी प्लेटफार्म पर सुन सकते हैं ।

title: O Livro dos Espíritos
description:
Este podcast tem como objetivo o estudo de O Livro dos Espíritos que é uma obra fundamental da doutrina espírita. Foi codificada pelo educador francês Allan Kardec no século XIX. Publicado pela primeira vez em 1857, o livro é composto por uma série de perguntas e respostas que abordam os princípios e os fundamentos da filosofia espírita. Dividido em quatro partes, O Livro dos Espíritos busca fornecer uma compreensão mais profunda sobre a natureza do espírito, a imortalidade da alma, as leis morais, a vida após a morte e a existência de Deus. Tem como objetivo principal esclarecer questões filosóficas, morais e espirituais, buscando promover o entendimento sobre a natureza humana, o propósito da vida e a relação entre os seres espirituais e o mundo material. Através de suas respostas, Kardec procurou consolidar uma visão de mundo fundamentada na razão, na lógica e na busca pelo progresso moral e intelectual.

Produção: EM Lives TV.

Realização: Projeto Espiritismo e Mediunidade.

title: Entretelones de la Obsesión
description:
Estudio de la Obra de Manoel Philomeno de Miranda, psicigrafiada por Divaldo Franco. Focaliza el trasfondo del problema de la obsesión, que es un flagelo social. Presenta los hechos ocurridos, en Salvador Bahía, con la Familia Suarez, que se encontraba bajo el proceso de una perturbación espiritual. Nos muestra los procedimientos del plano superior realizados en auxilio a aquella familia a través de las reuniones ocurridas en la Unión Espirita Bahíana. Fue publicado por la Federación Espirita Brasileña en 1970.

title: God and the Paranormal
description:
A BIBLICAL PERSPECTIVE on ghosts, UFOs, Bigfoot, cryptids, demons, angels, psychics, magic, miracles, and other paranormal high strangeness.

Why a Christian podcast about stranger things? Yes, there are many crucial topics for us to ponder and engage, such as evangelism, sanctification, outreach, and discipleship. However, there are often situations in which less important side issues sneak up from behind and bite the more important ones. Although the supernatural is just one component among many others in a biblical worldview, it's becoming increasingly evident that unbiblical paranormal beliefs are significantly altering the worldviews of our society and of many Bible-believing Christians. The pop-culture paranormal makes people question what they've believed to be true, which ultimately leads many to question the integrity of God's Word. Worldview matters, and when worldviews change, there will be tangible consequences to evangelism, discipleship, and faith in general. "God and the Paranormal" takes an in-depth look at what "experiencers" claim and how the phenomena interact with scriptural truth.

See YouTube versions for pic, notes, charts,,,

Website: ThinkingAboutTheBible.com

Email: godandtheparanormal@gmail.com

title: Is God Mother?
description:
Co-hosts Amy Stapleton and Shealy Salas explore the World Mission Society Church of God from the Christian perspective.

Episode 1 "What is a cult?" In this episode we talk about the definition of a pseudo-Christian cult and what the major pseudo-Christian cults have in common. We also discuss how to respond if a member of a cult approaches you or if you have a friend or family member who you think might be in a cult.

Episode 2 "Who are these people?" In this episode we dive deeper into the World Mission Society Church of God and explore their history and what they believe.

Episode 3 "Is God Mother?" In this episode we look at the major claims the WMSCOG makes about the Bible including their belief that God is mother. We share some basic rules for how to interpret Scripture and we give a refutation for each major claim.

Episode 4 "The baby and the bathwater" In this episode we examine the historical evidence for Christianity - touching on the topics of the unity of the Biblical message, the truthfulness of the Bible and it's accuracy. We compare the historical evidence for Christianity with that of the WMSCOG and other cults.

title: The Beauty In Realism
description:
Welcome to "The Beauty in Realism" podcast, a show dedicated to empowering young adults to embrace authenticity and live life on their own terms. Join us as we embark on a journey of self-discovery, growth, and the pursuit of inner peace.

In each episode, we'll explore the beauty of being real and true to ourselves, navigating the challenges of modern life while embracing our unique identities. Our inspiring guests will share their personal stories and experiences, shedding light on how they've overcome obstacles and found strength in authenticity.

Whether you're facing the pressures of societal expectations, striving for personal growth, or seeking tranquility amidst chaos, this podcast is your compass to steer towards a more genuine and fulfilling life. Together, we'll celebrate the imperfections that make us human and discover the power of vulnerability and self-acceptance.

Get ready to be inspired, uplifted, and encouraged to find the beauty in being your true self. Tune in to "The Beauty in Realism" and embark on a transformative journey to live authentically, embrace your uniqueness, and find peace amidst the journey of life.

title: Painéis da Obsessão
description:
"Painéis da Obsessão" é um livro psicografado por Manoel Philomeno de Miranda, através da mediunidade de Divaldo Franco. Publicado em 1995, faz parte da série "A Vida no Mundo Espiritual". O livro aborda temas relacionados à obsessão espiritual e seus impactos na vida das pessoas.

Feito de painéis que retratam obsessões, este livro resume diversos estudos sobre essa palpitante questão, especialmente procurando demostrar como, ao lado do desequilíbrio emocional causado pelos perturbadores do Além-túmulo, a tuberculose mais facilmente se manifesta em razão do bombardeio sofrido pelos macrófagos, degenerados pela contínua ação mental leviana do próprio paciente e, também, decorrente da intoxicação por sucessivas ondas mentais desagregadoras do seu perseguidor, favorecendo, assim, a instalação e virulência do bacilo de Koch, com as consequências compreensíveis em quadro de tal natureza. Outrossim, examinamos ocorrências variadas, nas quais a obsessão se encontra presente, bem como as técnicas e terapias espirituais aplicadas, nem sempre aceitas ou assimiladas pelos enfermos de ambos os lados da vida. Fazemos votos de que estas páginas encontrem ressonância nos que padecem de obsessões, auxiliando-os a desvencilhar-se da cruel ocorrência, ao mesmo tempo em que possam contribuir com algum subsídio útil aos que as estudam, no que diz respeito ao concurso dos abnegados instrutores espirituais, que trabalham afanosamente em prol do progresso da criatura humana e do planeta que nos serve de domicílio e oportunidade de crescimento interior.

title: Transtornos Psiquiátricos e Obsessivos
description:
"Transtornos Psiquiátricos e Obsessivos" é um livro psicografado por Divaldo Franco, de autoria do espírito Manoel Philomeno de Miranda. O livro aborda profundamente a compreensão dos transtornos mentais e obsessivos à luz da doutrina espírita.

O autor espiritual narra o nobre trabalho de dedicados Benfeitores desencarnados que, atendendo aos anseios de trabalhadores espíritas, que mourejam numa clínica psiquiátrica, desejosos de receber mais ampla ajuda para o mister da saúde mental dos internados, instalaram um centro de atividades especializadas naquele nosocômio. São relatados os esforços e as providências tomadas pelos Espíritos superiores, enquanto estudam e apresentam soluções para os diversos transtornos de alguns dos internados na clínica. Diversos aspectos dos distúrbios mentais e de comportamento são elucidados com riqueza de detalhes, contribuindo para o esclarecimento de todos que tiverem a oportunidade de ler o livro. Manoel Philomeno de Miranda, na condição de repórter gentil, entrevista diversos Mensageiros do Mundo causal, oferecendo-nos páginas enriquecedoras, cujo conteúdo jamais será esquecido.

Além disso, o livro oferece orientações práticas para lidar com os desafios dos transtornos mentais e obsessivos, incluindo o cultivo de virtudes, a prática da prece, a reforma íntima e a busca pelo autoconhecimento como meios de superação e cura.

title: Estudando o Evangelho
description:
O estudo do Evangelho de Jesus envolve a leitura atenta dos textos bíblicos, a reflexão sobre seus ensinamentos e a aplicação de seus princípios na vida diária. Essa prática busca compreender a mensagem de amor, compaixão, perdão e ensinamentos morais transmitidos por Jesus Cristo.

O Novo Testamento é um compilado de 27 de livros da Bíblia cristã, distribuídos em 260 capítulos, escritos originalmente em grego, entre 50 e 150 d.C. Está dividido em 4 partes: Os Evangelhos, O Livro Histórico, As Epístolas e o Livro Profético.

Nesta série, encontraremos valiosas orientações para enfrentar os desafios da vida, além de aprendermos a lidar com situações éticas e morais de forma mais consciente e assertiva.

title: A Light On The Hill
description:
Welcome to "A Light on the Hill," the podcast that ignites your curiosity and illuminates the hidden stories that shape our world. I'm your host, Shan Hutch, and I'm thrilled to invite you on a journey of discovery that will leave you inspired, informed, and hungry for more.

In a world overflowing with noise and haste, it's easy to overlook the stories that truly matter—the stories that offer a deeper understanding of our past, present, and future. This podcast isn't just a collection of conversations; it's a beacon of knowledge, shining a light on the most captivating narratives that often go unnoticed. Join me as we embark on a mission to unearth the gems buried beneath the surface.

Why is "A Light on the Hill" an essential addition to your playlist? Because it's not just another podcast—it's a source of enlightenment, a place where stories are not only told but woven into the fabric of our collective consciousness. Each episode is carefully crafted to transport you to a different time, place, or perspective, allowing you to see the world through fresh eyes.

As your guide, I'm not here to simply relay facts; I'm here to create an experience. My passion for storytelling and my insatiable curiosity drive me to uncover the layers of each narrative, revealing the emotions, challenges, and triumphs that define them. Together, we'll explore the intersections of science, art, philosophy, and human nature, connecting the dots between seemingly disparate threads to reveal the rich tapestry of our existence.

But it's not just the content that sets "A Light on the Hill" apart—it's the sense of community we're building. This podcast isn't a one-way street; it's a conversation starter. Engage with us on social media, share your thoughts, and suggest topics you're eager to explore. Let's create a space where curiosity is celebrated and knowledge is a treasure shared among friends.

title: From Religion to Self
description:
Hello everyone, welcome to From Religion to Self Podcast with your host Terry Malatji.

Who is Terry Malatji?

I am a life coach, spiritual teacher, author & educator of Principles & Tools of Creation. I am also a founder of Life with Terry - a coaching, wellness, & education company established to help people create & live a fulfilled life, create effectively & efficiently , and embark on a life journey of Self-discovery, Self-development & Self-healing.

PURPOSE OF PODCAST

This podcast was created to talk about religion, indoctrination, colonisation and brain washing & reversal thereof. I use the word Self to refer to the original version of the body, the spirt, mind and soul before colonisation, indoctrination and brain washing caused by religion.

I was indoctrinated, colonised and brainwashed for decades by Christian religion, from the time I was born until 2019 when I embarked on a beautiful journey of Self-discovery, Self-development & Self-healing. Since then I have never looked back.

The decolonisation of the faith-based religion, surprisingly led to further decolonisation of multiple non-faith based religions and human made systems that unfortunately limit our abilities to find and manifest Self.

This podcast is one of the platforms that I will use to manifest the undeniable deep calling of sharing my journey, enlightening & healing others as we raise the individual & collective consciousness of the human race. The podcast will help you create & live a fulfilled life, create effectively & efficiently, embark on life journey of Self-discovery, Self-development & Self-healing.

There is no better time than now. What a time to be alive, in the presence of a powerful force filled with the energy of truth & healing of human race.

The ultimate goal of this podcast is to help my non-indoctrinated listeners to understand the impact of religion on a human being & find better ways to relate with those who are indoctrinated. It is also to enlighten my listeners who are colonised and brainwashed, to remember who they are, heal & restore themselves from multiple traumas caused by religion.

May you find healing, freedom, peace, joy, happiness, love, health, light & every positive energy that you can think, raise your consciousness of as we embark on this beautiful journey together. May you connect with Self and become the creator that you are destined to become.

Visit https://www.lifewithterry.com

NB! Please note that episodes 3-8 were moved from the Podcast Life with Terry @ https://rss.com/podcasts/lifewithterry/.

We are also pleased to announce that we have a new Podcast dedicated to the subject matter of Principles & Tools of Creation. Tune in @ https://rss.com/podcasts/principlesandtoolsofcreation/ and be empowered. Become the creator that you were meant to be.
