title: LOS ESCRITOS DE URANTIA
description:
LOS ESCRITOS DE URANTIA (2012 a 2021), una nueva y admirable traducción de The Urantia Book (1955), presenta la revelación de la verdad haciéndose eco del fluir natural y bello de la lengua española. Se compone de 196 escritos divididos en cuatro partes.

La Parte I, El universo central y los suprauniversos, describe a Dios y la Trinidad del Paraíso, el gran universo con sus numerosos mundos y habitantes, miríadas de ángeles y seres celestiales y el significativo propósito y destino de toda la creación. También da a conocer el concepto del modelador del pensamiento, el espíritu de Dios que mora en nuestras mentes y nos guía durante nuestras vidas.

La Parte II, El universo local, aborda la creación, evolución y administración de los planetas habitados en nuestra región del universo. Trata de los mundos en los que despertamos cuando perecemos, los seres con los que nos encontramos, nuestra paulatina espiritualización en estas esferas y los mundos que nos esperan a lo largo de la eternidad.

La Parte III, La historia de Urantia, se ocupa de la historia de nuestro planeta, Urantia, desde sus orígenes hasta tiempos recientes. En esta parte se profundiza en las consecuencias de la rebelión de Lucifer, en la transgresión de Adán y Eva y en la trascendencia de la experiencia religiosa.

La Parte IV, La vida y las enseñanzas de Jesús, es una nueva exposición de su vida con detalles de sus años perdidos, jamás antes revelados. Presenta a Jesús, tanto humano como divino, en su dimensión cósmica.

title: Mostly Hairless Apes
description:
Episode 1: Belief

Belief is one half of our information. The other half is knowledge. Belief is what we each accept without proof. Knowledge is what we can prove to each other with independent facts.

Because no one knows everything, we depend on our belief systems to fill in the gaps of information. Science is the best belief system for better information because it requires the simplest belief - that the universe exists with constant properties, and the scientific method is the best way to discover them.

Join the Church of Science! The services are lots of fun.

title: Unveiling Divine Purpose: The Creation of Christianity and Islam"
description: In this episode of Noahide Insights, we embark on a profound journey to uncover the divine purpose behind the creation of two major religions: Christianity and Islam. Join us as we delve into the teachings of Maimonides, seeking to understand the higher spiritual reasons for these monumental events in human history.

title: Hope Found
description:
This is a podcast about doing life with God.

I found hope in the one and only true God through my salvation in Jesus and I want to share my journey with God via the scriptures and personal interactions.

Many of the podcasts will have a study of scriptures and others will contain interviews with other people and their stories finding hope in God.

- Hope

title: Project S.M.I.L.E
description: "Spiritually Minded is Life Eternal" is a profound and contemplative phrase that encapsulates a profound spiritual concept. It suggests that a person who maintains a deep, introspective connection with their inner self and a higher power experiences a sense of eternal life beyond the physical realm. This phrase emphasizes the importance of nurturing one's spiritual well-being as a pathway to a richer, more meaningful existence that transcends the limitations of mortal life. It serves as a reminder to prioritize spiritual growth, mindfulness, and a connection to the divine for a fulfilling and enduring life journey.

title: Rosemarie Burgos "The Living Podcast"
description: We are all souls here on Earth having a human experience. Every thing that happens to us or situations we encounter are moment our soul is experiencing emotions it would not otherwise feel. The exploration of how our mind and body work together to behave in these moments is where the magic or suffering happens. This podcast is about Living with the elements combined and how they play out with people.

title: Undefining Beauty Podcast
description: Conversations with international fashion and beauty photographer and Access Consciousness Certified Facilitator Andrea Belluso and special guests exploring what beauty is for different people and how beauty could be undefined. By removing all definitions of beauty could we finally receive everything and everyone, including ourselves, with no judgement, no projections and no expectations? And what could be created with looking at beauty this way on all levels of our lives?
